h4.p: [03] 1^b^.^eb^ hetuṃ ^a^T3.0001^ea^ ^a^M3.0001^ea^ ^a^V3.0001^ea^ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā -- alobhaṃ paṭicca adoso amoho, adosaṃ paṭicca alobho amoho, amohaṃ paṭicca alobho adoso, lobhaṃ paṭicca ^a^V3.0002^ea^ moho, mohaṃ paṭicca lobho, dosaṃ paṭicca moho, mohaṃ paṭicca doso; paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0.... (1)
[03] hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā -- hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ; paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0.... (2)

[03] hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā -- alobhaṃ paṭicca adoso amoho sampayuttakā ca khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ (cakkaṃ). lobhaṃ paṭicca moho sampayuttakā ca khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ...pe0... paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0.... (3)

[03] 2^b^.^eb^ nahetuṃ ^a^M3.0002^ea^ dhammaṃ ^a^T3.0002^ea^ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā -- nahetuṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ...pe0... dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ; paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0... khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā; ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ...pe0.... (1)
[03] nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā -- nahetū khandhe paṭicca hetū; paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0... vatthuṃ paṭicca hetū. (2)

[03] nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā -- nahetuṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā hetu ca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ...pe0... dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā hetu ca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ; paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0... paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ paṭicca hetū sampayuttakā ca khandhā. (3)

[03] 3^b^.^eb^ hetuñca nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā -- alobhañca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca adoso amoho (cakkaṃ). lobhañca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca moho, dosañca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca moho...pe0... paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0... alobhañca vatthuñca paṭicca adoso amoho...pe0.... (1)

[03] hetuñca ^a^V3.0003^ea^ nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā -- nahetuṃ ekaṃ khandhañca hetuñca paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ...pe0... dve khandhe ca hetuñca paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ; paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0... paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuñca hetuñca paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā. (2)

[03] hetuñca nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti ^a^T3.0003^ea^ hetupaccayā -- nahetuṃ ekaṃ khandhañca alobhañca paṭicca tayo khandhā adoso amoho ca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ...pe0... dve khandhe ca alobhañca paṭicca dve khandhā adoso amoho ca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ (cakkaṃ). nahetuṃ ekaṃ khandhañca lobhañca paṭicca tayo khandhā moho ca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0... vatthuñca alobhañca paṭicca adoso amoho sampayuttakā ca khandhā. (3)

[03] 4^b^.^eb^ hetuṃ ^a^M3.0003^ea^ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā (rūpaṃ chaḍḍetvā arūpeyeva nava pañhā)... adhipatipaccayā (paṭisandhi natthi, paripuṇṇaṃ) ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca...pe0... mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ upādārūpaṃ... (imaṃ nānaṃ) anantarapaccayā... samanantarapaccayā... sahajātapaccayā (sabbe mahābhūtā yāva asaññasattā)... aññamaññapaccayā... nissayapaccayā... upanissayapaccayā... purejātapaccayā... āsevanapaccayā (dvīsupi paṭisandhi natthi)... kammapaccayā... vipākapaccayā (saṃkhittaṃ)... avigatapaccayā.
[03] 5^b^.^eb^ hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava (sabbattha nava), avigate nava (evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ).
[06] anulomaṃ.

[03] 6^b^.^eb^ nahetuṃ ^a^V3.0004^ea^ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā -- ahetukaṃ nahetuṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca ^a^T3.0004^ea^ rūpaṃ...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0... khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā; ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ...pe0... bāhiraṃ... āhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ... utusamuṭṭhānaṃ... asaññasattānaṃ...pe0....(1)
[03] nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā -- vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. (2)
[03] 7^b^.^eb^ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati nāarammaṇapaccayā -- hetuṃ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ; paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0.... (1)
[03] nahetuṃ ^a^M3.0004^ea^ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati nāarammaṇapaccayā -- nahetū khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ; paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0... sabbe mahābhūtā...pe0.... (1)

[03] hetuñca nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati nāarammaṇapaccayā -- hetuñca nahetuñca khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ; paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0... nādhipatipaccayā... (paripuṇṇaṃ) nānantarapaccayā... nasamanantarapaccayā... nāññamaññapaccayā... naupanissayapaccayā.

[03] 8^b^.^eb^ hetuṃ ^a^V3.0005^ea^ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā -- arūpe alobhaṃ paṭicca adoso amoho (cakkaṃ). lobhaṃ paṭicca moho, mohaṃ paṭicca lobho; paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0.... (1)
[03] hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā -- arūpe hetuṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā, hetuṃ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ ^a^T3.0005^ea^ rūpaṃ; paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0.... (2)

[03] hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti napurejātapaccayā -- arūpe alobhaṃ paṭicca adoso amoho sampayuttakā ca khandhā (cakkaṃ). lobhaṃ paṭicca moho sampayuttakā ca khandhā (cakkaṃ); paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0.... (3)

[03] 9^b^.^eb^ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā -- arūpe nahetuṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā...pe0... nahetū khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ; paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0... ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ...pe0.... (1)
[03] nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā -- arūpe nahetū khandhe paṭicca hetū; paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0.... (2)

[03] nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti napurejātapaccayā -- arūpe nahetuṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā hetu ca...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0.... (3)

[03] 10^b^.^eb^ hetuñca nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā -- arūpe alobhañca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca adoso amoho ^a^M3.0005^ea^ (cakkaṃ). arūpe lobhañca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca moho (cakkaṃ); paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0.... (1)

[01] hetuñca ^a^V3.0006^ea^ nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā -- arūpe nahetuṃ ekaṃ khandhañca hetuñca paṭicca tayo khandhā...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... nahetū khandhe ca hetuñca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, hetuñca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ ^a^T3.0006^ea^; paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0.... (2)

[01] hetuñca nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti napurejātapaccayā -- arūpe nahetuṃ ekaṃ khandhañca alobhañca paṭicca tayo khandhā adoso amoho ca...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... (cakkaṃ). nahetuṃ ekaṃ khandhañca lobhañca paṭicca tayo khandhā moho ca (cakkaṃ); paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0.... (3)
[03] 11^b^.^eb^ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu dhammo uppajjati napacchājātapaccayā... nāasevanapaccayā.
[03] 12^b^.^eb^ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā -- hetuṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā cetanā. (1)
[01] nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā -- nahetū khandhe paṭicca sampayuttakā cetanā... bāhiraṃ... āhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ... utusamuṭṭhānaṃ...pe0.... (1)
[01] hetuñca nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā -- hetuñca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca sampayuttakā cetanā. (1)
[01] hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu dhammo uppajjati navipākapaccayā... nava.

[03] 13^b^.^eb^ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati nāahārapaccayā -- bāhiraṃ... utusamuṭṭhānaṃ... asaññasattānaṃ...pe0... naindriyapaccayā ^a^T3.0007^ea^ -- bāhiraṃ... āhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ ^a^M3.0006^ea^... utusamuṭṭhānaṃ...pe0... asaññasattānaṃ mahābhūte paṭicca rūpajīvitindriyaṃ, najhānapaccayā -- pañcaviññāṇaṃ ^a^V3.0007^ea^ ...pe0... bāhiraṃ... āhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ... utusamuṭṭhānaṃ... asaññasattānaṃ...pe0... namaggapaccayā -- ahetukaṃ nahetuṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca...pe0... bāhiraṃ... āhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ... utusamuṭṭhānaṃ... asaññasattānaṃ...pe0... nasampayuttapaccayā... navippayuttapaccayā... (napurejātasadisaṃ, arūpapañhāyeva) nonatthipaccayā... novigatapaccayā.

[03] 14^b^.^eb^ nahetuyā dve, nāarammaṇe tīṇi, nādhipatiyā nava, nānantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, nāññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, nāasevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, nāahāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte nava, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi (evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ).
[06] paccanīyaṃ.

[03] 15^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayā nāarammaṇe tīṇi, nādhipatiyā nava, nānantare tīṇi...pe0... naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, nāasevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte ^a^T3.0008^ea^ nava, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
[06] anulomapaccanīyaṃ.

[03] 16^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayā ^a^M3.0007^ea^ ^a^V3.0008^ea^ ārammaṇe dve, anantare dve...pe0... kamme dve, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre dve, indriye dve, jhāne dve, magge ekaṃ, sampayutte dve...pe0... avigate dve.
[06] paccanīyānulomaṃ.

[03] (sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi paṭiccavārasadisāyeva pañhā. mahābhūtesu niṭṭhitesu ``vatthuṃ paccayā''ti kātabbā. pañcāyatanāni anulomepi paccanīyepi yathā labbhanti tathā kātabbā. saṃsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi paripuṇṇo. rūpaṃ natthi, arūpameva.)

[03] 17^b^.^eb^ hetu dhammo hetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- alobho adosassa amohassa hetupaccayena paccayo (cakkaṃ). lobho mohassa hetupaccayena paccayo, doso mohassa hetupaccayena paccayo; paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0.... (1)
[03] hetu ^a^V3.0009^ea^ dhammo nahetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo; paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0.... (2)

[03] hetu dhammo hetussa ca nahetussa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo ^a^T3.0009^ea^ -- alobho adosassa amohassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo (cakkaṃ). lobho mohassa...pe0... paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0.... (3)
[03] 18^b^.^eb^ hetu ^a^M3.0008^ea^ dhammo hetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo -- hetuṃ ārabbha hetū uppajjanti. (1)
[03] hetu dhammo nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo -- hetuṃ ārabbha nahetū khandhā uppajjanti. (2)
[03] hetu dhammo hetussa ca nahetussa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo -- hetuṃ ārabbha hetū ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti. (3)

[03] 19^b^.^eb^ nahetu dhammo nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo -- dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ...pe0... uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni paccavekkhati. jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā...pe0... ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ paccavekkhanti, phalaṃ...pe0... nibbānaṃ...pe0... nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. ariyā nahetū pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti, cakkhuṃ...pe0... vatthuṃ, nahetū khandhe aniccato...pe0... domanassaṃ uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti, cetopariyañāṇena nahetucittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānāti. ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ {ākāsānañcāyatanakiriyaṃ (syā0) evamuparipi tīsu ṭhānesu} viññāṇañcāyatanassa...pe0... ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ ^a^T3.0010^ea^ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanassa...pe0... rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa...pe0... phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa ^a^V3.0010^ea^ ...pe0... nahetū khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] nahetu dhammo hetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo -- dānaṃ datvā (paṭhamagamanaṃyeva, āvajjanā natthi. rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa...pe0... phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassāti idaṃ natthi). (2)

[03] nahetu dhammo hetussa ca nahetussa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo -- dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ...pe0... uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ paccavekkhati, taṃ ^a^M3.0009^ea^ ārabbha hetū ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti (tattha tattha ṭhitena imaṃ kātabbaṃ dutiyagamanasadisaṃ). (3)
[03] 20^b^.^eb^ hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā hetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo -- hetuñca sampayuttake ca khandhe ārabbha hetū uppajjanti. (1)
[03] hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo -- hetuñca sampayuttake ca khandhe ārabbha nahetū khandhā uppajjanti. (2)
[03] hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā hetussa ca nahetussa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo -- hetuñca sampayuttake ca khandhe ārabbha hetū ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti. (3)

[03] 21^b^.^eb^ hetu dhammo hetussa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati. ^b^ārammaṇādhipati^eb^ -- hetuṃ garuṃ katvā hetū ^a^T3.0011^ea^ uppajjanti. ^b^sahajātādhipati^eb^ -- hetu adhipati sampayuttakānaṃ hetūnaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] hetu dhammo nahetussa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati ^a^V3.0011^ea^. ^b^ārammaṇādhipati^eb^ -- hetuṃ garuṃ katvā nahetū khandhā uppajjanti. ^b^sahajātādhipati^eb^ -- hetu adhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] hetu dhammo hetussa ca nahetussa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati. ^b^ārammaṇādhipati^eb^ -- hetuṃ garuṃ katvā hetū ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti. ^b^sahajātādhipati^eb^ -- hetu adhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetūnañca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 22^b^.^eb^ nahetu dhammo nahetussa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati. ^b^ārammaṇādhipati^eb^ -- dānaṃ datvā (vitthāretabbaṃ yāva. nahetū khandhā). ^b^sahajātādhipati^eb^ -- nahetu adhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] nahetu ^a^M3.0010^ea^ dhammo hetussa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati. ^b^ārammaṇādhipati^eb^ -- dānaṃ datvā (saṃkhittaṃ. yāva vatthu nahetū ca khandhā tāva kātabbaṃ). ^b^sahajātādhipati^eb^ nahetu adhipati sampayuttakānaṃ hetūnaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] nahetu dhammo hetussa ca nahetussa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati ^a^T3.0012^ea^. ^b^ārammaṇādhipati^eb^ -- dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ...pe0... uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati, taṃ garuṃ katvā nahetū khandhā ca hetū ca uppajjanti, pubbe suciṇṇāni (yāva vatthu nahetū khandhā, ca tāva kātabbaṃ). ^b^sahajātādhipati^eb^ -- nahetu adhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetūnañca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] 23^b^.^eb^ hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā hetussa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^ārammaṇādhipati^eb^ -- hetuñca sampayuttake ca khandhe garuṃ katvā hetū uppajjanti. (1)
[03] hetu ^a^V3.0012^ea^ ca nahetu ca dhammā nahetussa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^ārammaṇādhipati^eb^ -- hetuñca sampayuttake ca khandhe garuṃ katvā nahetū khandhā uppajjanti. (2)

[03] 24^b^.^eb^ hetu dhammo hetussa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimā purimā hetū pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ hetūnaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 40^b^.^eb^ nahetu ^a^M3.0017^ea^ dhammo nahetussa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ, āhāraṃ, indriyaṃ. ^b^sahajāto^eb^ -- nahetu eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhā...pe0... paṭisandhikkhaṇe nahetu eko khandho ^a^T3.0021^ea^ tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ...pe0... khandhā vatthussa atthipaccayena paccayo; vatthu khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo; ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ...pe0... bāhiraṃ... āhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ... utusamuṭṭhānaṃ... asaññasattānaṃ...pe0.... ^b^purejātaṃ^eb^ -- cakkhuṃ...pe0... vatthuṃ...pe0... dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti, rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa...pe0... phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa, cakkhāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa...pe0... kāyāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa, vatthu nahetūnaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchājātā^eb^ -- nahetū khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^kabaḷīkāro āhāro^eb^ imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^rūpajīvitindriyaṃ^eb^ kaṭattārūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. [03] 41^b^.^eb^ hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā hetussa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- ^b^sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ. sahajāto^eb^ -- alobho ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā adosassa amohassa atthipaccayena paccayo (cakkaṃ) ^a^M3.0018^ea^. lobho ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā mohassa atthipaccayena paccayo (cakkaṃ); paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0... alobho ca vatthu ca adosassa amohassa atthipaccayena paccayo (cakkaṃ). [03] hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā nahetussa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ, āhāraṃ, indriyaṃ. ^b^sahajāto^eb^ -- nahetu eko khandho ca hetū ca tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhā...pe0... paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0... paṭisandhikkhaṇe hetū ca vatthu ca nahetūnaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajātā^eb^ -- hetū ca mahābhūtā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchājātā^eb^ -- hetū ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa kāyassa ^b^atthipaccayena^eb^ paccayo. ^b^pacchājātā^eb^ -- hetū ca rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā hetussa ^a^T3.0023^ea^ ca nahetussa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- ^b^sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ. sahajāto^eb^ -- nahetu eko khandho ca alobho ca tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ adosassa amohassa cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo (cakkaṃ). nahetu eko khandho ca lobho ca tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ mohassa cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo (cakkaṃ); paṭisandhikkhaṇe nahetu eko khandho ca alobho ca (cakkaṃ). paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0... alobho ca vatthu ca adosassa amohassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo, lobho ca vatthu ca mohassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo....
[03] natthipaccayena paccayo... vigatapaccayena paccayo... avigatapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 42^b^.^eb^ hetuyā ^a^V3.0021^ea^ tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, vipāke nava, āhāre tīṇi, indriye nava, jhāne tīṇi, magge ^a^M3.0019^ea^ nava, sampayutte nava, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā nava, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate nava (evaṃ anumajjantena gaṇetabbaṃ).
[06] anulomaṃ.
[03] 43^b^.^eb^ hetu dhammo hetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... sahajātapaccayena ^a^T3.0024^ea^ paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[01] hetu dhammo nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... sahajātapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. (2)
[03] hetu dhammo hetussa ca nahetussa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... sahajātapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 44^b^.^eb^ nahetu dhammo nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... sahajātapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... purejātapaccayena paccayo... pacchājātapaccayena paccayo... kammapaccayena paccayo... āhārapaccayena paccayo... indriyapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] nahetu ^a^V3.0022^ea^ dhammo hetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... sahajātapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... purejātapaccayena paccayo... kammapaccayena paccayo. (2)
[03] nahetu dhammo hetussa ca nahetussa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... sahajātapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... purejātapaccayena paccayo... kammapaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] 45^b^.^eb^ hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā hetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... sahajātapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... sahajātapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (2)
[03] hetu ^a^T3.0025^ea^ ^a^M3.0020^ea^ ca nahetu ca dhammā hetussa ca nahetussa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... sahajātapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] 46^b^.^eb^ nahetuyā nava, nāarammaṇe nava...pe0... noavigate nava (evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ).
[06] paccanīyaṃ.

[03] 47^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayā nāarammaṇe tīṇi, nādhipatiyā tīṇi, nānantare tīṇi, nasamanantare ^a^V3.0023^ea^ tīṇi, nāññamaññe ekaṃ, naupanissaye tīṇi...pe0... namagge tīṇi, nasampayutte ekaṃ, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi (evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ).
[06] anulomapaccanīyaṃ.

[03] 48^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte tīṇi, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye nava, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, vipāke tīṇi, āhāre tīṇi, indriye tīṇi, jhāne tīṇi, magge tīṇi, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte tīṇi, atthiyā tīṇi, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate tīṇi (evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ).
[06] paccanīyānulomaṃ.
[06] hetudukaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 91^b^.^eb^ hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā ekaṃ, anantare cha, samanantare cha, sahajāte cha, aññamaññe cha, nissaye cha, upanissaye cha, purejāte cha...pe0... vipāke dve, āhāre cha, indriye cha, jhāne cha, magge pañca...pe0... avigate cha (evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ).

[03] 98^b^.^eb^ sahetuko dhammo sahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo -- dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ...pe0... uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni paccavekkhati, jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṃ paccavekkhati. ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ paccavekkhanti, phalaṃ paccavekkhanti. pahīne kilese...pe0... vikkhambhite kilese...pe0... pubbe...pe0... sahetuke ^a^T3.0047^ea^ khandhe aniccato...pe0... domanassaṃ uppajjati; kusalākusale niruddhe sahetuko vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjati; cetopariyañāṇena sahetukacittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānanti. ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanassa...pe0... ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanassa...pe0... sahetukā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo; sahetuke khandhe ārabbha sahetukā khandhā uppajjanti. [03] 99^b^.^eb^ ahetuko dhammo ahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo -- nibbānaṃ āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo; cakkhuṃ...pe0... vatthuṃ... ahetuke khandhe ca mohañca aniccato...pe0... domanassaṃ uppajjati; kusalākusale niruddhe ahetuko vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjati; rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa...pe0... phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa...pe0... ahetuke khandhe ca mohañca ārabbha ahetukā khandhā ca moho ca uppajjanti ^a^T3.0048^ea^. [03] sahetuko ca ahetuko ca dhammā sahetukassa ca ahetukassa ca dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatūpanissayo -- vicikicchāsahagatā ^a^V3.0054^ea^ uddhaccasahagatā khandhā ca moho ca vicikicchāsahagatānaṃ uddhaccasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ mohassa ca upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 109^b^.^eb^ ahetuko dhammo ahetukassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo -- ārammaṇapurejātaṃ, vatthupurejātaṃ. ^b^ārammaṇapurejātaṃ^eb^ -- cakkhuṃ...pe0... vatthuṃ aniccato...pe0... domanassaṃ uppajjati, kusalākusale niruddhe ahetuko vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjati; rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa ^a^T3.0055^ea^ ...pe0... phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa purejātapaccayena paccayo ^a^M3.0046^ea^. ^b^vatthupurejātaṃ^eb^ -- cakkhāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa...pe0... kāyāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa... purejātaṃ vatthu ahetukānaṃ khandhānaṃ mohassa ca purejātapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] ahetuko dhammo sahetukassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo -- ārammaṇapurejātaṃ, vatthupurejātaṃ. ^b^ārammaṇapurejātaṃ^eb^ -- cakkhuṃ...pe0... vatthuṃ aniccato...pe0... domanassaṃ uppajjati; kusalākusale niruddhe sahetuko vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti. ^b^vatthupurejātaṃ^eb^ -- vatthu sahetukānaṃ khandhānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] ahetuko dhammo sahetukassa ca ahetukassa ca dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo -- ārammaṇapurejātaṃ, vatthupurejātaṃ. ^b^ārammaṇapurejātaṃ^eb^ -- cakkhuṃ...pe0... vatthuṃ ārabbha vicikicchāsahagatā uddhaccasahagatā khandhā ca moho ca uppajjanti. ^b^vatthupurejātaṃ^eb^ -- vatthu vicikicchāsahagatānaṃ uddhaccasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ mohassa ca purejātapaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] 110^b^.^eb^ sahetuko dhammo ahetukassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo -- pacchājātā sahetukā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] ahetuko ^a^V3.0055^ea^ dhammo ahetukassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo -- pacchājātā ahetukā khandhā ca moho ca purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] sahetuko ^a^T3.0056^ea^ ca ahetuko ca dhammā ahetukassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo -- pacchājātā vicikicchāsahagatā uddhaccasahagatā khandhā ca moho ca purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] sahetuko dhammo sahetukassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo (anantarasadisaṃ. āvajjanampi bhavaṅgampi natthi, āsevanapaccaye vajjetabbā navapi ).

[03] 111^b^.^eb^ sahetuko ^a^M3.0047^ea^ dhammo sahetukassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā. ^b^sahajātā^eb^ -- sahetukā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo; paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0.... ^b^nānākkhaṇikā^eb^ -- sahetukā cetanā vipākānaṃ sahetukānaṃ khandhānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] sahetuko dhammo ahetukassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā. ^b^sahajātā^eb^ -- sahetukā cetanā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo; paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0.... ^b^nānākkhaṇikā^eb^ -- sahetukā cetanā vipākānaṃ ahetukānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] sahetuko dhammo sahetukassa ca ahetukassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā. ^b^sahajātā^eb^ -- sahetukā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. ^b^nānākkhaṇikā^eb^ -- sahetukā cetanā vipākānaṃ sahetukānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena ^a^T3.0057^ea^ paccayo. (3)

[03] ahetuko dhammo ahetukassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- ahetukā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ ^a^V3.0056^ea^ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo; paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0.... (1)
[03] 112^b^.^eb^ sahetuko dhammo sahetukassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo -- vipāko sahetuko eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ...pe0... dve khandhā...pe0... paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0.... (1)
[03] sahetuko dhammo ahetukassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo -- vipākā sahetukā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ vipākapaccayena paccayo; paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0.... (2)

[03] sahetuko dhammo sahetukassa ca ahetukassa ca dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo -- vipāko sahetuko eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ...pe0... dve khandhā...pe0... paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0.... (3)

[03] ahetuko ^a^M3.0048^ea^ dhammo ahetukassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo -- vipāko ahetuko eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ...pe0... dve khandhā...pe0... paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0... khandhā vatthussa vipākapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] 113^b^.^eb^ sahetuko dhammo sahetukassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo... tīṇi.

[03] ahetuko dhammo ahetukassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo -- ahetukā āhārā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ...pe0... paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0... kabaḷīkāro āhāro imassa kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] 114^b^.^eb^ sahetuko ^a^T3.0058^ea^ ^a^V3.0057^ea^ dhammo sahetukassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo... tīṇi.

[03] ahetuko dhammo ahetukassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo -- ahetukā indriyā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ...pe0... paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0... cakkhundriyaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa...pe0... kāyindriyaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa indriyapaccayena paccayo; rūpajīvitindriyaṃ kaṭattārūpānaṃ indriyapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] sahetuko dhammo sahetukassa dhammassa jhānapaccayena paccayo... tīṇi.
[03] ahetuko dhammo ahetukassa dhammassa jhānapaccayena paccayo -- ahetukāni jhānaṅgāni sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ...pe0... paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0.... (1)
[03] sahetuko dhammo sahetukassa dhammassa maggapaccayena paccayo... tīṇi.
[03] sahetuko dhammo sahetukassa dhammassa sampayuttapaccayena paccayo (paṭiccavāre sampayuttasadisā cha pañhā).

[03] 115^b^.^eb^ sahetuko ^a^M3.0049^ea^ dhammo ahetukassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ. ^b^sahajātā^eb^ -- sahetukā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo; paṭisandhikkhaṇe sahetukā khandhā kaṭattārūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchājātā^eb^ -- sahetukā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena ^a^T3.0059^ea^ paccayo. (1)

[03] ahetuko dhammo ahetukassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ. ^b^sahajātā^eb^ -- ahetukā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo; paṭisandhikkhaṇe ahetukā khandhā kaṭattārūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo; khandhā vatthussa vippayuttapaccayena ^a^V3.0058^ea^ paccayo; vatthu khandhānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejātaṃ^eb^ -- cakkhāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa...pe0... kāyāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa... vatthu ahetukānaṃ khandhānaṃ mohassa ca vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchājātā^eb^ -- ahetukā khandhā ca moho ca purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] ahetuko dhammo sahetukassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ. ^b^sahajātaṃ^eb^ -- paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthu sahetukānaṃ khandhānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejātaṃ^eb^ -- vatthu sahetukānaṃ khandhānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] ahetuko dhammo sahetukassa ca ahetukassa ca dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejātaṃ^eb^ -- vatthu vicikicchāsahagatānaṃ uddhaccasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ mohassa ca vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] sahetuko ca ahetuko ca dhammā ahetukassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ. ^b^sahajātā^eb^ -- vicikicchāsahagatā uddhaccasahagatā khandhā ca moho ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchājātā^eb^ -- vicikicchāsahagatā uddhaccasahagatā khandhā ca moho ^a^T3.0060^ea^ ca purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] 116^b^.^eb^ sahetuko ^a^M3.0050^ea^ dhammo sahetukassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahetuko eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ...pe0... dve khandhā...pe0... paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0.... (1)

[03] sahetuko dhammo ahetukassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ. ^b^sahajātā^eb^ -- sahetukā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo; vicikicchāsahagatā uddhaccasahagatā khandhā mohassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo; paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0.... ^b^pacchājātā^eb^ -- sahetukā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] sahetuko ^a^V3.0059^ea^ dhammo sahetukassa ca ahetukassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahetuko eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo; vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ mohassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhā...pe0... paṭisandhikkhaṇe sahetuko...pe0.... (3)

[03] 117^b^.^eb^ ahetuko dhammo ahetukassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ, āhāraṃ, indriyaṃ. ^b^sahajāto^eb^ -- ahetuko eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhā...pe0... vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo; paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0... (yāva asaññasattā kātabbaṃ). ^b^purejātaṃ^eb^ -- cakkhuṃ...pe0... vatthuṃ ^a^T3.0061^ea^ aniccato...pe0... domanassaṃ uppajjati, kusalākusale niruddhe ahetuko vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjati; rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa...pe0... phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa...pe0... cakkhāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa...pe0... kāyāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa atthipaccayena paccayo; vatthu ahetukānaṃ khandhānaṃ mohassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchājātā^eb^ -- ahetukā khandhā ca moho ca purejātassa imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo; ^b^kabaḷīkāro āhāro^eb^ ^a^M3.0051^ea^ imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo; ^b^rūpajīvitindriyaṃ^eb^ kaṭattārūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] ahetuko dhammo sahetukassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ. ^b^sahajāto^eb^ -- vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo; paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthu sahetukānaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejātaṃ^eb^ -- cakkhuṃ...pe0... vatthuṃ aniccato...pe0... domanassaṃ uppajjati; kusalākusale niruddhe sahetuko vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti, vatthu sahetukānaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] ahetuko dhammo sahetukassa ca ahetukassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ. ^b^sahajāto^eb^ -- vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ ^a^V3.0060^ea^ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejātaṃ^eb^ -- cakkhuṃ...pe0... vatthuṃ ārabbha vicikicchāsahagatā uddhaccasahagatā khandhā ^a^T3.0062^ea^ ca moho ca uppajjanti, vatthu vicikicchāsahagatānaṃ uddhaccasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ mohassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 118^b^.^eb^ sahetuko ca ahetuko ca dhammā sahetukassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ. ^b^sahajāto^eb^ -- vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato eko khandho ca moho ca tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhā ca...pe0... paṭisandhikkhaṇe sahetuko eko khandho ca vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhā ca...pe0.... ^b^sahajāto^eb^ -- sahetuko eko khandho ca vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhā ca...pe0.... (1)

[03] sahetuko ca ahetuko ca dhammā ahetukassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ, āhāraṃ, indriyaṃ. ^b^sahajātā^eb^ -- sahetukā khandhā ca mahābhūtā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo; vicikicchāsahagatā uddhaccasahagatā khandhā ca moho ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo; paṭisandhikkhaṇe sahetukā khandhā ca mahābhūtā ca kaṭattārūpānaṃ atthipaccayena ^a^M3.0052^ea^ paccayo. ^b^sahajātā^eb^ -- vicikicchāsahagatā uddhaccasahagatā khandhā ca vatthu ca mohassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchājātā^eb^ -- vicikicchāsahagatā uddhaccasahagatā khandhā ca moho ca purejātassa imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchājātā^eb^ -- sahetukā khandhā ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchājātā^eb^ -- sahetukā ^a^T3.0063^ea^ khandhā ca rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] sahetuko ca ahetuko ca dhammā sahetukassa ca ahetukassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ. ^b^sahajāto^eb^ -- vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato eko khandho ca moho ca tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0.... ^b^sahajāto^eb^ -- vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato eko khandho ca vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ mohassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhā ca...pe0.... (3)

[03] 119^b^.^eb^ hetuyā ^a^V3.0061^ea^ cha, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā cattāri, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe cha, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane nava, kamme cattāri, vipāke cattāri, āhāre cattāri, indriye cattāri, jhāne cattāri, magge tīṇi, sampayutte cha, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā nava, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate nava (evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ).
[06] anulomaṃ.
[03] 120^b^.^eb^ sahetuko dhammo sahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... sahajātapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... kammapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] sahetuko ^a^M3.0053^ea^ dhammo ahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... sahajātapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena ^a^T3.0064^ea^ paccayo... pacchājātapaccayena paccayo... kammapaccayena paccayo. (2)
[03] sahetuko dhammo sahetukassa ca ahetukassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... sahajātapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... kammapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 121^b^.^eb^ ahetuko dhammo ahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... sahajātapaccayena ^a^V3.0062^ea^ paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... purejātapaccayena paccayo... pacchājātapaccayena paccayo... āhārapaccayena paccayo... indriyapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] ahetuko dhammo sahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... sahajātapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... purejātapaccayena paccayo. (2)
[03] ahetuko dhammo sahetukassa ca ahetukassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... sahajātapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... purejātapaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] 122^b^.^eb^ sahetuko ca ahetuko ca dhammā sahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... sahajātapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] sahetuko ca ahetuko ca dhammā ahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... sahajātapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. (2)
[03] sahetuko ca ahetuko ca dhammā sahetukassa ca ahetukassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... sahajātapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] 123^b^.^eb^ nahetuyā ^a^T3.0065^ea^ ^a^M3.0054^ea^ nava...pe0... (sabbattha nava) noavigate nava (evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ).
[06] paccanīyaṃ.

[03] 124^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayā nāarammaṇe cha, nādhipatiyā cha, nānantare cha, nasamanantare cha, nāññamaññe dve, naupanissaye cha...pe0... namagge cha, nasampayutte dve, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā cha, novigate cha (evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ).
[06] anulomapaccanīyaṃ.

[03] 125^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā cattāri, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe cha, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane nava, kamme cattāri, vipāke cattāri, āhāre cattāri, indriye cattāri, jhāne cattāri, magge tīṇi, sampayutte cha, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā nava, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate nava (evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ).
[06] paccanīyānulomaṃ.
[06] sahetukadukaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 126^b^.^eb^ hetusampayuttaṃ ^a^T3.0066^ea^ ^a^M3.0055^ea^ ^a^V3.0064^ea^ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā -- hetusampayuttaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0.... (1)
[03] hetusampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā -- hetusampayutte khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ; paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0.... (2)
[03] (iminā kāraṇena vitthāretabbaṃ yathā sahetukadukaṃ ninnānākaraṇaṃ.)
[06] hetusampayuttadukaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 127^b^.^eb^ hetuñceva ^a^V3.0065^ea^ sahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā -- alobhaṃ paṭicca adoso amoho (cakkaṃ). lobhaṃ paṭicca moho (cakkaṃ); paṭisandhikkhaṇe alobhaṃ paṭicca adoso amoho (cakkaṃ). (1)
[03] hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā -- hetuṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā; paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0.... (2)

[03] hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ceva sahetuko ^a^T3.0067^ea^ ca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā -- alobhaṃ paṭicca adoso amoho sampayuttakā ca khandhā (cakkaṃ). lobhaṃ paṭicca moho sampayuttakā ca khandhā (cakkaṃ); paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0.... (3)

[03] 128^b^.^eb^ sahetukañceva ^a^M3.0056^ea^ na ca hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo uppajjati ^a^V3.0066^ea^ hetupaccayā -- sahetukañceva na ca hetuṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0....(1)
[01] sahetukañceva na ca hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā -- sahetuke ceva na ca hetū khandhe paṭicca hetū; paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0.... (2)

[01] sahetukañceva na ca hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ceva sahetuko ca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā -- sahetukañceva na ca hetuṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā hetu ca...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0.... (3)

[03] 129^b^.^eb^ hetuñceva sahetukañca sahetukañceva na ca hetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā -- alobhañca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca adoso amoho (cakkaṃ). lobhañca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca moho (cakkaṃ); paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0.... (1)

[01] hetuñceva sahetukañca sahetukañceva na ca hetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā -- sahetukañceva na ca hetuṃ ekaṃ khandhañca hetuñca paṭicca tayo khandhā...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0.... (2)

[01] hetuñceva sahetukañca sahetukañceva na ca hetuñca dhammaṃ ^a^T3.0068^ea^ paṭicca hetu ceva sahetuko ca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā -- sahetukañceva na ca hetuṃ ekaṃ khandhañca alobhañca paṭicca tayo khandhā adoso amoho ca...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0.... (3)
[03] (saṃkhittaṃ. evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)
[03] 130^b^.^eb^ hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava...pe0... (sabbattha nava), avigate nava (evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ).
[06] anulomaṃ.

[03] 131^b^.^eb^ hetuñceva ^a^M3.0057^ea^ ^a^V3.0067^ea^ sahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati nādhipatipaccayā -- alobhaṃ paṭicca adoso amoho (cakkaṃ); paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0... (paripuṇṇaṃ nava), napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, nāasevane nava.
[03] 132^b^.^eb^ hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā -- hetuṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā cetanā. (1)
[01] sahetukañceva na ca hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā -- sahetuke ceva na ca hetū khandhe paṭicca sampayuttakā cetanā; paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0....

[01] hetuñceva sahetukañca sahetukañceva na ca hetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā -- hetuñca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca sampayuttakā cetanā... navipākapaccayā... navippayuttapaccayā.
[03] 133^b^.^eb^ nādhipatiyā ^a^T3.0069^ea^ nava, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, nāasevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, navippayutte nava (evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ).
[06] paccanīyaṃ.
[03] 134^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayā ^a^M3.0058^ea^ ^a^V3.0068^ea^ nādhipatiyā nava, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, nāasevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, navippayutte nava (evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ).
[06] anulomapaccanīyaṃ.
[03] 135^b^.^eb^ nādhipatipaccayā hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, anantare nava...pe0... avigate nava (evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ).
[06] paccanīyānulomaṃ.
[03] (sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṃsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi paṭiccavārasadisā.)

[03] 136^b^.^eb^ hetu ^a^V3.0069^ea^ ceva sahetuko ca dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- alobho adosassa amohassa hetupaccayena paccayo (yathā paṭiccavārasadisaṃ). (1)
[03] hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo; paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0.... (2)

[03] hetu ^a^M3.0059^ea^ ceva sahetuko ca dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa ca dhammassa ^a^T3.0070^ea^ hetupaccayena paccayo -- alobho adosassa amohassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo (vitthāretabbaṃ). (3)
[03] 137^b^.^eb^ hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo -- hetuṃ ārabbha hetū uppajjanti. (1)
[03] hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo -- hetuṃ ārabbha sahetukā ceva na ca hetū khandhā uppajjanti. (2)

[03] hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa ^a^V3.0070^ea^ ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo -- hetuṃ ārabbha hetū ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti. (3)

[03] sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo -- dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ...pe0... uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni paccavekkhati. jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā...pe0... ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ paccavekkhanti, phalaṃ paccavekkhanti. pahīne kilese...pe0... vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti. sahetuke ceva na ca hetū khandhe aniccato...pe0... domanassaṃ uppajjati. cetopariyañāṇena sahetukā ceva na ca hetucittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānāti; ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanassa...pe0... ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanassa...pe0... sahetukā ceva na ca hetū khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa ^a^T3.0071^ea^, anāgataṃsañāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo -- dānaṃ datvā... (yathā paṭhamagamanaṃ evaṃ ninnānaṃ). (2)

[03] sahetuko ^a^M3.0060^ea^ ceva na ca hetu dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo -- dānaṃ datvā... (yathā paṭhamagamanaṃ evaṃ ninnānaṃ). (3)

[03] 138^b^.^eb^ hetu ceva sahetuko ca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu ca dhammā hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo -- hetuñca sampayuttake ca khandhe ārabbha hetū uppajjanti. (1)

[03] hetu ceva sahetuko ca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu ca dhammā sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo -- hetuñca sampayuttake ca khandhe ārabbha sahetukā ceva na ca hetū khandhā uppajjanti. (2)

[03] hetu ^a^V3.0071^ea^ ceva sahetuko ca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu ca dhammā hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo -- hetuñca sampayuttake ca khandhe ārabbha hetū ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti. (3)

[03] 139^b^.^eb^ hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati. ^b^ārammaṇādhipati^eb^ -- hetuṃ garuṃ katvā hetū uppajjanti. ^b^sahajātādhipati^eb^ -- hetu ceva sahetukādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ hetūnaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati. ^b^ārammaṇādhipati^eb^ -- hetuṃ garuṃ katvā sahetukā ceva na ca hetū khandhā uppajjanti. ^b^sahajātādhipati^eb^ -- hetu ceva sahetukādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena ^a^T3.0072^ea^ paccayo -- ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati. ^b^ārammaṇādhipati^eb^ -- hetuṃ garuṃ katvā ^a^M3.0061^ea^ hetū ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti. ^b^sahajātādhipati^eb^ -- hetu ceva sahetukādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetūnañca adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 140^b^.^eb^ sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati. ^b^ārammaṇādhipati^eb^ -- dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ...pe0... uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni...pe0... jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati, ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, phalaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, sahetuke ceva na ca hetū khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati; taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi ^a^V3.0072^ea^ uppajjati. ^b^sahajātādhipati^eb^ -- sahetuko ceva na ca hetu adhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati. ^b^ārammaṇādhipati^eb^ -- dānaṃ datvā... (paṭhamagamanaṃyeva). ^b^sahajātādhipati^eb^ -- sahetuko ceva na ^a^T3.0073^ea^ ca hetu adhipati sampayuttakānaṃ hetūnaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati. ^b^ārammaṇādhipati^eb^ -- dānaṃ datvā... (paṭhamagamanaṃyeva). ^b^sahajātādhipati^eb^ -- sahetuko ceva na ca hetu adhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetūnañca adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 141^b^.^eb^ hetu ceva sahetuko ca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu ca dhammā hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^ārammaṇādhipati^eb^ -- hetū ca sampayuttake ca khandhe garuṃ katvā hetū uppajjanti. (1)

[03] hetu ceva sahetuko ca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu ca dhammā sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^ārammaṇādhipati^eb^ ^a^M3.0062^ea^ -- hetuñca sampayuttake ca khandhe garuṃ katvā sahetukā ceva na ca hetū khandhā uppajjanti. (2)

[03] hetu ceva sahetuko ca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu ca dhammā hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^ārammaṇādhipati^eb^ -- hetuñca sampayuttake ca khandhe garuṃ katvā hetū ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti. (3)

[03] 142^b^.^eb^ hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa anantarapaccayena ^a^V3.0073^ea^ paccayo -- purimā purimā hetū pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ hetūnaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimā purimā ^a^T3.0074^ea^ hetū pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ sahetukānañceva na ca hetūnaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa ca dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimā purimā hetū pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ hetūnaṃ sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 143^b^.^eb^ sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimā purimā sahetukā ceva na ca hetū khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ sahetukānañceva na ca hetūnaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo; anulomaṃ gotrabhussa... anulomaṃ vodānassa...pe0... nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa, nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimā purimā sahetukā ceva na ca hetū khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ hetūnaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo; anulomaṃ gotrabhussa... (saṃkhittaṃ). (2)

[03] sahetuko ^a^M3.0063^ea^ ceva na ca hetu dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa ca dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimā purimā sahetukā ceva na ca hetū khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ hetūnaṃ sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo; anulomaṃ gotrabhussa...pe0.... (3)
[03] (sahetuko ceva na ca hetumūlakaṃ tīṇipi ekasadisā.)

[03] 144^b^.^eb^ hetu ^a^V3.0074^ea^ ceva sahetuko ca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu ca dhammā hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo ^a^T3.0075^ea^ -- purimā purimā hetū ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ hetūnaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] hetu ceva sahetuko ca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu ca dhammā sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimā purimā hetū ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ sahetukānañceva na ca hetūnaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo.(2)

[03] hetu ceva sahetuko ca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu ca dhammā hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa ca dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimā purimā hetū ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ hetūnaṃ sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 145^b^.^eb^ hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo... aññamaññapaccayena paccayo... nissayapaccayena paccayo (tīṇipi paccayā paṭiccavāre hetusadisā).

[03] 146^b^.^eb^ hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatūpanissayo -- hetū hetūnaṃ upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (mūlaṃ kātabbaṃ) hetū sahetukānañceva ^a^M3.0064^ea^ na ca hetūnaṃ khandhānaṃ upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (mūlaṃ kātabbaṃ) hetū hetūnaṃ sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ upanissayapaccayena paccayo (imesaṃ dvinnampi pañhānaṃ mūlāni pucchitabbāni).

[03] sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa ca dhammassa ^a^T3.0076^ea^ upanissayapaccayena ^a^V3.0075^ea^ paccayo -- ^b^ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatūpanissayo -- saddhaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti...pe0... samāpattiṃ uppādeti, mānaṃ jappeti, diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti, sīlaṃ...pe0... patthanaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti...pe0... saṅghaṃ bhindati; saddhā...pe0... patthanā saddhāya...pe0... patthanāya maggassa phalasamāpattiyā upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] (sahetuko ceva na ca hetumūlake iminākārena vitthāretabbā avasesā dve pañhā.)

[03] hetu ceva sahetuko ca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu ca dhammā hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatūpanissayo -- hetū ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā hetūnaṃ upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (dve mūlāni pucchitabbāni) hetū ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā sahetukānañceva na ca hetūnaṃ khandhānaṃ upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (mūlaṃ pucchitabbaṃ) hetū ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā hetūnaṃ sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] 147^b^.^eb^ hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo (anantarasadisaṃ).

[03] 148^b^.^eb^ sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā. ^b^sahajātā^eb^ -- sahetukā ceva na ca hetū cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo; paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0.... ^b^nānākkhaṇikā^eb^ ^a^M3.0065^ea^ -- sahetukā ceva na ca hetū cetanā vipākānaṃ ^a^T3.0077^ea^ sahetukānañceva na ca hetūnaṃ khandhānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo ^a^V3.0076^ea^ -- sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā. ^b^sahajātā^eb^ -- sahetukā ceva na ca hetū cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ hetūnaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo; paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0.... ^b^nānākkhaṇikā^eb^ -- sahetukā ceva na ca hetū cetanā vipākānaṃ hetūnaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā. ^b^sahajātā^eb^ -- sahetukā ceva na ca hetū cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetūnañca kammapaccayena paccayo; paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0.... ^b^nānākkhaṇikā^eb^ -- sahetukā ceva na ca hetū cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetūnañca kammapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 149^b^.^eb^ hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo -- vipāko alobho adosassa amohassa ca vipākapaccayena paccayo (cakkaṃ); paṭisandhikkhaṇe alobho (yathā hetupaccayā evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ, navapi vipākanti niyāmetabbaṃ).
[03] 150^b^.^eb^ sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo... tīṇi.
[03] hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo (indriyanti niyāmetabbaṃ, navapi paripuṇṇaṃ).
[03] sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa dhammassa ^a^T3.0078^ea^ jhānapaccayena paccayo... tīṇi.

[03] hetu ^a^M3.0066^ea^ ceva sahetuko ca dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa maggapaccayena paccayo ^a^V3.0077^ea^... sampayuttapaccayena paccayo... atthipaccayena paccayo... natthipaccayena paccayo... vigatapaccayena paccayo... avigatapaccayena paccayo.

[03] 151^b^.^eb^ hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, vipāke nava, āhāre tīṇi, indriye nava, jhāne tīṇi, magge nava, sampayutte nava, atthiyā nava, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate nava (evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ).
[06] anulomaṃ.
[03] 152^b^.^eb^ hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... sahajātapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... sahajātapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (2)
[03] hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... sahajātapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 153^b^.^eb^ sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo sahetukassa ^a^T3.0079^ea^ ceva na ca hetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... sahajātapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... kammapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[01] sahetuko ^a^M3.0067^ea^ ^a^V3.0078^ea^ ceva na ca hetu dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... sahajātapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... kammapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[01] sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... sahajātapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... kammapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 154^b^.^eb^ hetu ceva sahetuko ca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu ca dhammā hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... sahajātapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[01] hetu ceva sahetuko ca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu ca dhammā sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... sahajātapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] hetu ceva sahetuko ca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu ca dhammā hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... sahajātapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] 155^b^.^eb^ nahetuyā nava (saṃkhittaṃ. sabbattha nava, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ).
[06] paccanīyaṃ.

[03] 156^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayā ^a^V3.0079^ea^ nāarammaṇe tīṇi, nādhipatiyā tīṇi, nānantare ^a^T3.0080^ea^ tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi (saṃkhittaṃ. sabbattha tīṇi) ^a^M3.0068^ea^, namagge tīṇi, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi (evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ).

[03] 157^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte tīṇi, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye nava, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, vipāke tīṇi, āhāre tīṇi, indriye tīṇi, jhāne tīṇi, magge tīṇi, sampayutte tīṇi, atthiyā tīṇi, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate tīṇi (evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ).
[06] paccanīyānulomaṃ.
[06] hetusahetukadukaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 158^b^.^eb^ hetuñceva ^a^V3.0080^ea^ hetusampayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā -- alobhaṃ paṭicca adoso amoho (cakkaṃ). lobhaṃ paṭicca moho (cakkaṃ); paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0... (yathā hetusahetukadukaṃ evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ, ninnānākaraṇaṃ).
[06] hetuhetusampayuttadukaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 159^b^.^eb^ nahetuṃ ^a^T3.0081^ea^ ^a^M3.0069^ea^ ^a^V3.0081^ea^ sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā -- nahetuṃ sahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0.... (1)
[03] nahetuṃ sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā -- nahetū sahetuke khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ; paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0.... (2)

[03] nahetuṃ sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu sahetuko ca nahetu ahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā -- nahetuṃ sahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0.... (3)

[03] 160^b^.^eb^ nahetuṃ ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ^a^V3.0082^ea^ ...pe0... ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca...pe0... mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ kaṭattārūpaṃ upādārūpaṃ. (1)
[03] nahetuṃ ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā -- paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ paṭicca nahetū sahetukā khandhā. (2)

[03] nahetuṃ ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu sahetuko ca nahetu ahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā -- paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ paṭicca nahetū sahetukā khandhā, mahābhūte paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṃ. (3)

[03] 161^b^.^eb^ nahetuṃ sahetukañca nahetuṃ ahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā -- paṭisandhikkhaṇe nahetuṃ sahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca ^a^T3.0082^ea^ vatthuñca paṭicca tayo khandhā...pe0... dve khandhe ca...pe0.... (1)

[03] nahetuṃ sahetukañca nahetuṃ ahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā -- nahetū sahetuke khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ; paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0.... (2)

[03] nahetuṃ ^a^M3.0070^ea^ sahetukañca nahetuṃ ahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu sahetuko ca nahetu ahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā -- paṭisandhikkhaṇe nahetuṃ sahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca tayo khandhā...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... nahetū sahetuke khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṃ. (3)

[03] 162^b^.^eb^ nahetuṃ sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā -- nahetuṃ sahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0.... (1)
[01] nahetuṃ ^a^V3.0083^ea^ ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ahetuko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā -- nahetuṃ ahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā...pe0... paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0.... (2)
[01] nahetuṃ ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā -- paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ paṭicca nahetū sahetukā khandhā. (3)

[01] nahetuṃ sahetukañca nahetuṃ ahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā -- paṭisandhikkhaṇe nahetuṃ sahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca tayo khandhā...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... (saṃkhittaṃ. evaṃ vibhajitabbaṃ).

[03] 163^b^.^eb^ hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare ^a^T3.0083^ea^ cattāri, samanantare cattāri, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe cha, nissaye nava, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte dve, āsevane dve, kamme nava, vipāke nava, āhāre nava (saṃkhittaṃ. sabbattha nava), sampayutte cattāri, vippayutte nava, atthiyā nava, natthiyā cattāri, vigate cattāri, avigate nava (evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ).
[06] anulomaṃ.

[03] 164^b^.^eb^ nahetuṃ ^a^M3.0071^ea^ ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ahetuko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā ^a^V3.0084^ea^ -- nahetuṃ ahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... paṭisandhikkhaṇe (yāva asaññasattā moho natthi). (1)
[03] 165^b^.^eb^ nahetuṃ sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ahetuko dhammo uppajjati nāarammaṇapaccayā -- nahetū sahetuke khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ; paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0.... (1)
[03] nahetuṃ ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ahetuko dhammo uppajjati nāarammaṇapaccayā -- nahetū ahetuke khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ; paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0... (yāva asaññasattā). (1)

[03] nahetuṃ sahetukañca nahetuṃ ahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ahetuko dhammo uppajjati nāarammaṇapaccayā -- nahetū sahetuke khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ; paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0... (saṃkhittaṃ).

[03] 166^b^.^eb^ nahetuyā ekaṃ, nāarammaṇe tīṇi, nādhipatiyā nava, nānantare ^a^T3.0084^ea^ tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, nāññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, nāasevane nava, nakamme dve, navipāke pañca, nāahāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi (evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ).
[06] paccanīyaṃ.

[03] 167^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayā ^a^M3.0072^ea^ ^a^V3.0085^ea^ nāarammaṇe tīṇi, nādhipatiyā nava, nānantare nava, nasamanantare nava, nāññamaññe nava, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, nāasevane nava, nakamme ekaṃ, navipāke pañca, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte ekaṃ, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi (evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ).
[06] anulomapaccanīyaṃ.
[03] 168^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe ekaṃ...pe0... āhāre ekaṃ...pe0... jhāne ekaṃ, sampayutte ekaṃ, vippayutte ekaṃ...pe0... vigate ekaṃ, avigate ekaṃ (evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ).
[06] paccanīyānulomaṃ.
[06] (sahajātavārepi evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
[03] 169^b^.^eb^ nahetuṃ ^a^V3.0086^ea^ sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nahetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... tīṇi.

[03] nahetuṃ ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nahetu ^a^T3.0085^ea^ ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā -- ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paccayā tayo mahābhūtā, mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, kaṭattārūpaṃ, upādārūpaṃ. (1)
[03] nahetuṃ ^a^M3.0073^ea^ ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nahetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā -- vatthuṃ paccayā nahetū sahetukā khandhā; paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0... (2)

[03] nahetuṃ ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nahetu sahetuko ca nahetu ahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā -- vatthuṃ paccayā nahetū sahetukā khandhā, mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ; paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0...(3)
[03] nahetuṃ sahetukañca nahetuṃ ahetukañca dhammaṃ paccayā nahetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā (ghaṭanā tīṇi, pavattipaṭisandhi paripuṇṇaṃ. saṃkhittaṃ).
[03] 170^b^.^eb^ hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cattāri...pe0... aññamaññe cha...pe0... purejāte āsevane cattāri...pe0... avigate nava (evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ).
[06] anulomaṃ.
[03] 171^b^.^eb^ nahetuyā ekaṃ, nāarammaṇe tīṇi...pe0... novigate tīṇi.
[06] paccanīyaṃ.
[06] (nissayavāro paccayavārasadiso.)
[03] 172^b^.^eb^ nahetuṃ ^a^V3.0087^ea^ sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho nahetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā -- nahetuṃ sahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ...pe0... paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0....
[03] 173^b^.^eb^ hetuyā ^a^T3.0086^ea^ ekaṃ, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā ekaṃ, anantare dve (sabbattha dve), magge ekaṃ...pe0... avigate dve.
[06] anulomaṃ.
[03] 174^b^.^eb^ nahetuṃ ^a^M3.0074^ea^ ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho nahetu ahetuko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā -- nahetuṃ ahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ...pe0... paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0....
[03] 175^b^.^eb^ nahetuyā ekaṃ, nādhipatiyā dve, napurejāte dve, napacchājāte dve, nāasevane dve, nakamme dve, navipāke dve, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, navippayutte dve.
[06] paccanīyaṃ.
[06] (evaṃ avasesāpi dve gaṇanā gaṇetabbā.)
[06] (sampayuttavāro saṃsaṭṭhavārasadiso)

[03] 176^b^.^eb^ nahetu ^a^V3.0088^ea^ sahetuko dhammo nahetusahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo -- dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ...pe0... uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni paccavekkhati; jhānaṃ...pe0... ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ paccavekkhanti, phalaṃ paccavekkhanti; pahīne kilese...pe0... vikkhambhite kilese...pe0... pubbe...pe0... nahetū sahetuke khandhe aniccato...pe0... domanassaṃ uppajjati; kusalākusale niruddhe nahetu sahetuko vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjati; cetopariyañāṇena nahetusahetukacittasamaṅgissa ^a^T3.0087^ea^ cittaṃ jānāti, ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ...pe0... ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ...pe0... nahetū sahetukā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo; nahetū sahetuke khandhe ārabbha nahetū sahetukā khandhā uppajjanti. (1)

[03] nahetu sahetuko dhammo nahetuahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo -- nahetū sahetuke khandhe aniccato...pe0... domanassaṃ ^a^M3.0075^ea^ uppajjati, kusalākusale niruddhe nahetu ahetuko vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjati, nahetū sahetuke khandhe ārabbha nahetū ahetukā khandhā uppajjanti. (2)

[03] 177^b^.^eb^ nahetu ^a^V3.0089^ea^ ahetuko dhammo nahetuahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo -- nibbānaṃ āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo; cakkhuṃ...pe0... vatthuṃ... nahetū ahetuke khandhe aniccato...pe0... domanassaṃ uppajjati; kusalākusale niruddhe nahetu ahetuko vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjati. rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa...pe0... phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa...pe0... nahetū ahetuke khandhe ārabbha nahetū ahetukā khandhā uppajjanti. (1)

[03] nahetu ahetuko dhammo nahetusahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo -- ariyā nibbānaṃ paccavekkhanti; nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo; cakkhuṃ...pe0... vatthuṃ... nahetū ahetuke khandhe aniccato ^a^T3.0088^ea^ ...pe0... domanassaṃ uppajjati; kusalākusale niruddhe nahetu sahetuko vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti. cetopariyañāṇena nahetuahetukacittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānāti. nahetū ahetukā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo; nahetū ahetuke khandhe ārabbha nahetū sahetukā khandhā uppajjanti. (2)

[03] 178^b^.^eb^ nahetu sahetuko dhammo nahetusahetukassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati. ^b^ārammaṇādhipati^eb^ -- dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati, jhānaṃ...pe0... ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, phalaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti. nahetū sahetuke khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati. ^b^sahajātādhipati^eb^ -- nahetusahetukādhipati ^a^M3.0076^ea^ sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] nahetu sahetuko dhammo nahetuahetukassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajātādhipati^eb^ -- nahetu sahetukādhipati cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] nahetu ^a^V3.0090^ea^ sahetuko dhammo nahetusahetukassa ca nahetuahetukassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajātādhipati^eb^ -- nahetu sahetukādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ ^a^T3.0089^ea^ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] nahetu ahetuko dhammo nahetusahetukassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^ārammaṇādhipati^eb^ -- ariyā nibbānaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti; nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo; cakkhuṃ...pe0... vatthuṃ... nahetū ahetuke khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati. (1)

[03] 179^b^.^eb^ nahetu sahetuko dhammo nahetusahetukassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimā purimā nahetū sahetukā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ nahetusahetukānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo; anulomaṃ gotrabhussa...pe0... nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] nahetu sahetuko dhammo nahetuahetukassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- nahetu sahetukaṃ cuticittaṃ nahetuahetukassa upapatticittassa anantarapaccayena paccayo; nahetu sahetukaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ āvajjanāya, nahetu sahetukaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ nahetuahetukassa bhavaṅgassa, nahetū sahetukā khandhā nahetuahetukassa vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] nahetu ahetuko dhammo nahetuahetukassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimā purimā nahetū ahetukā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ ^a^M3.0077^ea^ nahetuahetukānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo; āvajjanā pañcannaṃ viññāṇānaṃ anantarapaccayena ^a^T3.0090^ea^ paccayo. (1)

[03] nahetu ahetuko dhammo nahetusahetukassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- nahetu ahetukaṃ cuticittaṃ nahetusahetukassa upapatticittassa anantarapaccayena paccayo; āvajjanā nahetusahetukānaṃ ^a^V3.0091^ea^ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo; nahetū ahetukā khandhā nahetusahetukassa vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] 180^b^.^eb^ nahetu sahetuko dhammo nahetusahetukassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo... sahajātapaccayena paccayo (iha ghaṭanā natthi, satta pañhā)... aññamaññapaccayena paccayo (cha pañhā)... nissayapaccayena paccayo (pavattipaṭisandhi satta pañhā, iha ghaṭanā natthi).

[03] 181^b^.^eb^ nahetu sahetuko dhammo nahetusahetukassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatūpanissayo -- saddhaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti...pe0... mānaṃ jappeti, diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti; sīlaṃ...pe0... patthanaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti...pe0... saṅghaṃ bhindati; saddhā...pe0... patthanā saddhāya...pe0... patthanāya maggassa phalasamāpattiyā upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] nahetu sahetuko dhammo nahetuahetukassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatūpanissayo -- saddhā kāyikassa sukhassa, kāyikassa dukkhassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo; sīlaṃ...pe0... patthanā kāyikassa sukhassa, kāyikassa ^a^T3.0091^ea^ dukkhassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo; saddhā...pe0... patthanā kāyikassa sukhassa, kāyikassa dukkhassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] 182^b^.^eb^ nahetu ahetuko dhammo nahetuahetukassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatūpanissayo -- kāyikaṃ sukhaṃ kāyikassa sukhassa, kāyikassa dukkhassa ^a^M3.0078^ea^ upanissayapaccayena paccayo; kāyikaṃ dukkhaṃ... utu... bhojanaṃ... senāsanaṃ kāyikassa sukhassa, kāyikassa dukkhassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo; kāyikaṃ sukhaṃ... kāyikaṃ dukkhaṃ... utu... bhojanaṃ... senāsanaṃ kāyikassa sukhassa, kāyikassa dukkhassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. [03] nahetu ^a^V3.0092^ea^ ahetuko dhammo nahetusahetukassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatūpanissayo -- kāyikaṃ sukhaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti...pe0... saṅghaṃ bhindati; kāyikaṃ dukkhaṃ... utuṃ... bhojanaṃ... senāsanaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti...pe0... saṅghaṃ bhindati; kāyikaṃ sukhaṃ ...pe0... senāsanaṃ saddhāya...pe0... patthanāya maggassa phalasamāpattiyā upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] 183^b^.^eb^ nahetu ahetuko dhammo nahetuahetukassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo -- ārammaṇapurejātaṃ, vatthupurejātaṃ. ^b^ārammaṇapurejātaṃ^eb^ -- cakkhuṃ...pe0... vatthuṃ aniccato...pe0... domanassaṃ uppajjati; kusalākusale niruddhe nahetu ahetuko vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjati; rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa purejātapaccayena paccayo...pe0... phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa purejātapaccayena ^a^T3.0092^ea^ paccayo. ^b^vatthupurejātaṃ^eb^ -- cakkhāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa...pe0... kāyāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa... vatthu nahetuahetukānaṃ khandhānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] nahetu ahetuko dhammo nahetusahetukassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo -- ārammaṇapurejātaṃ, vatthupurejātaṃ. ^b^ārammaṇapurejātaṃ^eb^ -- cakkhuṃ...pe0... vatthuṃ aniccato...pe0... domanassaṃ uppajjati, kusalākusale niruddhe nahetu sahetuko vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti. ^b^vatthupurejātaṃ^eb^ -- vatthu nahetusahetukānaṃ khandhānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] 184^b^.^eb^ nahetu ^a^M3.0079^ea^ sahetuko dhammo nahetuahetukassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo -- pacchājātā nahetū sahetukā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] nahetu ^a^V3.0093^ea^ ahetuko dhammo nahetuahetukassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo -- pacchājātā nahetū ahetukā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 185^b^.^eb^ nahetu sahetuko dhammo nahetusahetukassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo -- purimā purimā nahetū sahetukā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ nahetusahetukānaṃ khandhānaṃ āsevanapaccayena paccayo... anulomaṃ gotrabhussa... anulomaṃ vodānassa... gotrabhu maggassa... vodānaṃ maggassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] nahetu ahetuko dhammo nahetuahetukassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo -- purimā ^a^T3.0093^ea^ purimā nahetū ahetukā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ nahetuahetukānaṃ khandhānaṃ āsevanapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 186^b^.^eb^ nahetu sahetuko dhammo nahetusahetukassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā. ^b^sahajātā^eb^ -- nahetu sahetukā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo; paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0.... ^b^nānākkhaṇikā^eb^ -- nahetu sahetukā cetanā vipākānaṃ nahetusahetukānaṃ khandhānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] nahetu sahetuko dhammo nahetuahetukassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā. ^b^sahajātā^eb^ -- nahetu sahetukā cetanā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo; paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0.... ^b^nānākkhaṇikā^eb^ -- nahetu sahetukā cetanā vipākānaṃ nahetuahetukānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] nahetu ^a^M3.0080^ea^ sahetuko dhammo nahetusahetukassa ca nahetuahetukassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā. ^b^sahajātā^eb^ -- nahetu sahetukā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo; paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0.... ^b^nānākkhaṇikā^eb^ ^a^V3.0094^ea^ -- nahetu sahetukā cetanā vipākānaṃ nahetusahetukānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] nahetu ahetuko dhammo nahetuahetukassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajātā^eb^ -- nahetu ahetukā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo; paṭisandhikkhaṇe nahetu ahetukā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ ^a^T3.0094^ea^ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 188^b^.^eb^ nahetu sahetuko dhammo nahetusahetukassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo... tīṇi.

[03] 191^b^.^eb^ nahetu sahetuko dhammo nahetusahetukassa dhammassa sampayuttapaccayena ^a^T3.0095^ea^ paccayo -- nahetu sahetuko eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ...pe0... paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0.... (1)

[03] 192^b^.^eb^ nahetu sahetuko dhammo nahetuahetukassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ. ^b^sahajātā^eb^ -- nahetū sahetukā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo; paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0.... ^b^pacchājātā^eb^ -- nahetū sahetukā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. [03] nahetu ahetuko dhammo nahetuahetukassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ. ^b^sahajātā^eb^ -- nahetū ahetukā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo; paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0... khandhā vatthussa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo; vatthu khandhānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejātaṃ^eb^ -- cakkhāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa...pe0... kāyāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa...pe0... vatthu nahetusahetukānaṃ khandhānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo ^a^V3.0096^ea^. ^b^pacchājātā^eb^ -- nahetū ahetukā ^a^M3.0082^ea^ khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. [03] 193^b^.^eb^ nahetu sahetuko dhammo nahetusahetukassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- nahetu sahetuko eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ...pe0... paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0.... (1)

(yāva asaññasattā). ^b^purejātaṃ^eb^ -- cakkhuṃ...pe0... vatthuṃ aniccato...pe0... domanassaṃ uppajjati; kusalākusale niruddhe nahetu ahetuko vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjati; rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa...pe0... phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa...pe0... cakkhāyatanaṃ...pe0... kāyāyatanaṃ...pe0... vatthu nahetuahetukānaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchājātā^eb^ -- nahetū ahetukā khandhā purejātassa...pe0... ^b^kabaḷīkāro āhāro^eb^ imassa kāyassa...pe0... ^b^rūpajīvitindriyaṃ^eb^ kaṭattārūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. [03] 194^b^.^eb^ nahetu sahetuko ca nahetu ahetuko ca dhammā nahetusahetukassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- ^b^sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ^eb^. sahajāto -- nahetu sahetuko eko khandho ca vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ...pe0... paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0... nahetu sahetuko eko khandho ca vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ...pe0.... [03] nahetu sahetuko ca nahetu ahetuko ca dhammā nahetuahetukassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ, āhāraṃ, indriyaṃ. ^b^sahajātā^eb^ -- nahetū sahetukā khandhā ca mahābhūtā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo; paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0.... ^b^pacchājātā^eb^ -- nahetū sahetukā khandhā ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchājātā^eb^ -- nahetū sahetukā khandhā ca rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0....
