[03] 195^b^.^eb^ ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā cattāri, anantare cattāri, samanantare cattāri, sahajāte satta, aññamaññe cha, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte dve, pacchājāte dve, āsevane dve, kamme cattāri, vipāke cattāri, āhāre cattāri, indriye cattāri, jhāne cattāri ^a^V3.0098^ea^, magge tīṇi, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tīṇi, atthiyā satta, natthiyā cattāri, vigate ^a^T3.0098^ea^ cattāri, avigate satta (evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ)
[06] anulomaṃ.
[03] 196^b^.^eb^ nahetu ^a^M3.0084^ea^ sahetuko dhammo nahetusahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... sahajātapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... kammapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] nahetu sahetuko dhammo nahetuahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... sahajātapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... pacchājātapaccayena paccayo... kammapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] 9^b^.^eb^ sappaccayo dhammo sappaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo -- dānaṃ datvā, sīlaṃ samādiyitvā, uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ ^a^T3.0102^ea^ paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni...pe0... jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā...pe0... ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ paccavekkhanti, phalaṃ paccavekkhanti; pahīne kilese...pe0... vikkhambhite kilese...pe0... pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti, cakkhuṃ...pe0... vatthuṃ... sappaccaye khandhe aniccato...pe0... domanassaṃ uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunā ^a^V3.0104^ea^ rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti. cetopariyañāṇena sappaccayacittasamaṅgissa ^a^M3.0088^ea^ cittaṃ jānāti, ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanassa...pe0... ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanassa...pe0... rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa...pe0... phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa...pe0... sappaccayā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. [03] appaccayo dhammo sappaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo -- ariyā nibbānaṃ paccavekkhanti; nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] appaṭigho dhammo appaṭighassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati. ^b^ārammaṇādhipati^eb^ -- dānaṃ...pe0... sīlaṃ...pe0... uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati, jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati, ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ ^a^T3.0131^ea^ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, phalaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti; nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo; vatthuṃ...pe0... itthindriyaṃ... purisindriyaṃ... jīvitindriyaṃ... āpodhātuṃ, kabaḷīkāraṃ āhāraṃ garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati. ^b^sahajātādhipati^eb^ -- appaṭighādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ appaṭighānañca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. [03] 119^b^.^eb^ arūpī ^a^T3.0151^ea^ dhammo arūpissa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo -- purimā purimā arūpino khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ arūpīnaṃ khandhānaṃ āsevanapaccayena paccayo.

[03] 120^b^.^eb^ arūpī dhammo arūpissa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā. ^b^sahajātā^eb^ -- arūpī cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo; paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0.... ^b^nānākkhaṇikā^eb^ -- arūpī cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] arūpī dhammo rūpissa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā. ^b^sahajātā^eb^ -- arūpī cetanā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo; paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0.... ^b^nānākkhaṇikā^eb^ -- arūpī cetanā kaṭattārūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] arūpī dhammo rūpissa ca arūpissa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā. ^b^sahajātā^eb^ -- arūpī cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena ^a^V3.0159^ea^ paccayo; paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0.... ^b^nānākkhaṇikā^eb^ -- arūpī cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] 121^b^.^eb^ arūpī dhammo arūpissa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo... tīṇi.
[03] rūpī dhammo rūpissa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo -- kabaḷīkāro āhāro imassa kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] arūpī dhammo arūpissa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo... tīṇi.
[03] 122^b^.^eb^ rūpī ^a^M3.0131^ea^ dhammo rūpissa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo -- rūpajīvitindriyaṃ ^a^T3.0152^ea^ kaṭattārūpānaṃ indriyapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] rūpī dhammo arūpissa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo -- cakkhundriyaṃ...pe0... kāyindriyaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa indriyapaccayena paccayo. (2)
[03] arūpī dhammo arūpissa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo... tīṇi.

[03] rūpī ca arūpī ca dhammā arūpissa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo -- cakkhundriyañca cakkhuviññāṇañca cakkhuviññāṇasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ indriyapaccayena paccayo...pe0... kāyindriyañca...pe0....
[03] 123^b^.^eb^ arūpī ^a^V3.0160^ea^ dhammo arūpissa dhammassa jhānapaccayena paccayo... tīṇi... maggapaccayena paccayo... tīṇi... sampayuttapaccayena paccayo... ekaṃ.

[03] 124^b^.^eb^ rūpī dhammo arūpissa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ. ^b^sahajātaṃ^eb^ -- paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthu arūpīnaṃ khandhānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejātaṃ^eb^ -- cakkhāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa...pe0... kāyāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa...pe0... vatthu arūpīnaṃ khandhānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] arūpī dhammo rūpissa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ. ^b^sahajātā^eb^ -- arūpino khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo; paṭisandhikkhaṇe arūpino khandhā kaṭattārūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo; arūpino khandhā vatthussa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchājātā^eb^ -- arūpino khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 125^b^.^eb^ rūpī ^a^T3.0153^ea^ ^a^M3.0132^ea^ dhammo rūpissa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajātaṃ, āhāraṃ, indriyaṃ. ^b^sahajātaṃ^eb^ -- ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ...pe0... (yāva asaññasattā), ^b^kabaḷīkāro āhāro^eb^ imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo; ^b^rūpajīvitindriyaṃ^eb^ kaṭattārūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] rūpī dhammo arūpissa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ. ^b^sahajātaṃ^eb^ -- paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthu arūpīnaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejātaṃ^eb^ -- cakkhuṃ...pe0... kabaḷīkāraṃ āhāraṃ aniccato...pe0... domanassaṃ uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti. rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa...pe0... phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa...pe0... cakkhāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa ^a^V3.0161^ea^ ...pe0... kāyāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa...pe0... vatthu arūpīnaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)
[03] 126^b^.^eb^ arūpī dhammo arūpissa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- arūpī eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ...pe0... dve khandhā...pe0... paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0.... (1)

[03] arūpī dhammo rūpissa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ. ^b^sahajātā^eb^ -- arūpino khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo; paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0... ^b^pacchājātā^eb^ -- arūpino khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] arūpī dhammo rūpissa ca arūpissa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- arūpī eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhā...pe0... paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0.... (3)

[03] 127^b^.^eb^ rūpī ca arūpī ca dhammā rūpissa dhammassa ^a^T3.0154^ea^ atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ, āhāraṃ, indriyaṃ. ^b^sahajātā^eb^ -- arūpī khandhā ca mahābhūtā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo; paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0.... ^b^pacchājātā^eb^ -- arūpino khandhā ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchājātā^eb^ -- arūpino khandhā ca rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] rūpī ^a^M3.0133^ea^ ca arūpī ca dhammā arūpissa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- ^b^sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ^eb^. sahajāto -- cakkhuviññāṇasahagato eko khandho ca cakkhāyatanañca tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhā ca...pe0... kāyaviññāṇasahagato...pe0... arūpī eko khandho ca vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhā ca...pe0... paṭisandhikkhaṇe arūpī eko khandho ca vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ...pe0... dve khandhā ca...pe0.... (2)
[03] natthipaccayena ^a^V3.0162^ea^ paccayo... vigatapaccayena paccayo... avigatapaccayena paccayo.

[03] 128^b^.^eb^ hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā cattāri, anantare ekaṃ, samanantare ekaṃ, sahajāte satta, aññamaññe cha, nissaye satta, upanissaye dve, purejāte ekaṃ, pacchājāte ekaṃ āsevane ekaṃ, kamme tīṇi, vipāke tīṇi, āhāre cattāri, indriye cha, jhāne tīṇi, magge tīṇi, sampayutte ekaṃ, vippayutte dve, atthiyā satta, natthiyā ekaṃ ^a^T3.0155^ea^, vigate ekaṃ, avigate satta.
[06] anulomaṃ.
[03] 129^b^.^eb^ rūpī dhammo rūpissa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo... āhārapaccayena paccayo... indriyapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] rūpī dhammo arūpissa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... sahajātapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... purejātapaccayena paccayo. (2)
[03] arūpī dhammo arūpissa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... sahajātapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... kammapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] arūpī ^a^M3.0134^ea^ ^a^V3.0163^ea^ dhammo rūpissa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo... pacchājātapaccayena paccayo... kammapaccayena paccayo. (2)
[03] arūpī dhammo rūpissa ca arūpissa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo... kammapaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] rūpī ca arūpī ca dhammā rūpissa dhammassa sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ, āhāraṃ, indriyaṃ. (1)
[03] rūpī ca arūpī ca dhammā arūpissa dhammassa sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ. (2)

[03] 130^b^.^eb^ nahetuyā satta, nāarammaṇe satta, nādhipatiyā satta, nānantare satta, nasamanantare satta, nasahajāte cha, nāññamaññe cha, nanissaye cha, naupanissaye satta, napurejāte satta ^a^T3.0156^ea^ ...pe0... namagge satta, nasampayutte cha, navippayutte pañca, noatthiyā cattāri, nonatthiyā satta, novigate satta, noavigate cattāri.
[06] paccanīyaṃ.

[03] 131^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayā nāarammaṇe tīṇi, nādhipatiyā tīṇi, nānantare tīṇi, nasamanantare ^a^V3.0164^ea^ tīṇi, nāññamaññe ekaṃ, naupanissaye tīṇi (sabbattha tīṇi), nasampayutte ekaṃ, navippayutte ekaṃ, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
[06] anulomapaccanīyaṃ.
[03] 132^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayā ^a^M3.0135^ea^ ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā cattāri (anulomamātikā kātabbā), avigate satta.
[06] paccanīyānulomaṃ.
[06] rūpīdukaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 133^b^.^eb^ lokiyaṃ ^a^V3.0165^ea^ dhammaṃ paṭicca lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā -- lokiyaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0... khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā, ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ...pe0... mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ ^a^T3.0157^ea^ rūpaṃ, kaṭattārūpaṃ, upādārūpaṃ. (1)
[03] 134^b^.^eb^ lokuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca lokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā -- lokuttaraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0.... (1)
[03] lokuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā -- lokuttare khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. (2)
[03] lokuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca lokiyo ca lokuttaro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā -- lokuttaraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0.... (3)
[03] lokiyañca lokuttarañca dhammaṃ paṭicca lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā -- lokuttare khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ (saṃkhittaṃ). (1)

[03] 135^b^.^eb^ hetuyā ^a^M3.0136^ea^ ^a^V3.0166^ea^ pañca, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare dve, samanantare dve, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye pañca, upanissaye dve, purejāte dve, āsevane dve, kamme pañca, vipāke pañca, āhāre pañca, indriye pañca, jhāne pañca, magge pañca, sampayutte dve, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā pañca, natthiyā dve, vigate dve, avigate pañca.
[06] anulomaṃ.

[03] 136^b^.^eb^ lokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca lokiyo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā -- ahetukaṃ lokiyaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca ^a^T3.0158^ea^ rūpaṃ...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0... (yāva asaññasattā) vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho (saṃkhittaṃ).

[03] 137^b^.^eb^ nahetuyā ^a^V3.0167^ea^ ekaṃ, nāarammaṇe tīṇi, nādhipatiyā dve, nānantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, nāññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte cattāri, napacchājāte pañca, nāasevane pañca (nāasevanamūlake lokuttare suddhake vipākoti niyāmetabbaṃ, avasesā pakatikāyeva), nakamme dve, navipāke pañca, nāahāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
[06] paccanīyaṃ.

[03] 138^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayā ^a^M3.0137^ea^ nāarammaṇe tīṇi, nādhipatiyā dve (nānantarapadādī paccanīyasadisā)...pe0... navipāke pañca, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
[06] anulomapaccanīyaṃ.
[03] 139^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayā ^a^V3.0168^ea^ ārammaṇe ekaṃ, anantare ekaṃ...pe0... avigate ekaṃ.
[06] paccanīyānulomaṃ.
[06] (sahajātavāro paṭiccavārasadiso).

[03] 140^b^.^eb^ lokiyaṃ ^a^T3.0159^ea^ dhammaṃ paccayā lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā -- lokiyaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā...pe0... ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ...pe0... mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, kaṭattārūpaṃ, upādārūpaṃ, vatthuṃ paccayā lokiyā khandhā. (1)
[03] lokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā lokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā -- vatthuṃ paccayā lokuttarā khandhā. (2)
[03] lokiyaṃ ^a^M3.0138^ea^ ^a^V3.0169^ea^ dhammaṃ paccayā lokiyo ca lokuttaro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā -- vatthuṃ paccayā lokuttarā khandhā, mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. (3)
[03] 141^b^.^eb^ lokuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paccayā lokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... tīṇi.
[03] lokiyañca lokuttarañca dhammaṃ paccayā lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā -- lokuttare khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. (1)
[03] lokiyañca lokuttarañca dhammaṃ paccayā lokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā -- lokuttaraṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0.... (2)

[03] lokiyañca lokuttarañca dhammaṃ paccayā lokiyo ca lokuttaro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā -- lokuttaraṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... lokuttare khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ (saṃkhittaṃ). (3)

[03] 142^b^.^eb^ hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā nava, anantare ^a^T3.0160^ea^ cattāri, samanantare cattāri, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe cattāri, nissaye nava, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte cattāri, āsevane cattāri, kamme nava, vipāke nava...pe0... magge nava, sampayutte cattāri, vippayutte nava, atthiyā nava, natthiyā cattāri, vigate cattāri, avigate nava.
[06] anulomaṃ.

[03] 143^b^.^eb^ lokiyaṃ ^a^M3.0139^ea^ ^a^V3.0170^ea^ dhammaṃ paccayā lokiyo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā -- ahetukaṃ lokiyaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ...pe0... (yāva asaññasattā) cakkhāyatanaṃ paccayā cakkhuviññāṇaṃ...pe0... kāyāyatanaṃ paccayā kāyaviññāṇaṃ, vatthuṃ paccayā ahetukā lokiyā khandhā, vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho (saṃkhittaṃ).

[03] 144^b^.^eb^ nahetuyā ekaṃ, nāarammaṇe tīṇi, nādhipatiyā cattāri, nānantare tīṇi...pe0... naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte cattāri, napacchājāte nava, nāasevane nava (lokuttare arūpe vipākanti niyāmetabbaṃ), nakamme cattāri, navipāke nava, nāahāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
[06] paccanīyaṃ.

[03] 145^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayā ^a^T3.0161^ea^ ^a^V3.0171^ea^ nāarammaṇe tīṇi, nādhipatiyā cattāri, nānantare tīṇi (nasamanantarapadādī paccanīyasadisā), navipāke nava, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
[06] anulomapaccanīyaṃ.
[03] 146^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayā ^a^M3.0140^ea^ ārammaṇe ekaṃ, anantare ekaṃ...pe0... avigate ekaṃ.
[06] paccanīyānulomaṃ.
[06] (nissayavāro paccayavārasadiso).

[03] 147^b^.^eb^ lokiyaṃ ^a^V3.0172^ea^ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā -- lokiyaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0.... (1)
[03] lokuttaraṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho lokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā -- lokuttaraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0.... (1)
[03] (saṃsaṭṭhavāro evaṃ vitthāretabbo, saha gaṇanāhi dve pañhā).
[06] (sampayuttavāro saṃsaṭṭhavārasadiso).
[03] 148^b^.^eb^ lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- lokiyā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo; paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0.... (1)
[03] lokuttaro ^a^M3.0141^ea^ ^a^V3.0173^ea^ dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo... tīṇi.

[03] 149^b^.^eb^ lokiyo ^a^T3.0162^ea^ dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo -- dānaṃ...pe0... sīlaṃ...pe0... uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni paccavekkhati, jhānā...pe0... ariyā gotrabhuṃ paccavekkhanti, vodānaṃ paccavekkhanti, pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese...pe0... pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti; cakkhuṃ...pe0... vatthuṃ lokiye khandhe aniccato...pe0... domanassaṃ uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti. cetopariyañāṇena lokiyacittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānāti, ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanassa...pe0... ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanassa...pe0... rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa...pe0... phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa, lokiyā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] 150^b^.^eb^ lokuttaro dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo -- nibbānaṃ maggassa, phalassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] lokuttaro dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo -- ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ paccavekkhanti, phalaṃ paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ paccavekkhanti; nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo; ariyā cetopariyañāṇena lokuttaracittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānanti, lokuttarā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa ^a^T3.0163^ea^, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] 151^b^.^eb^ lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati. ^b^ārammaṇādhipati^eb^ -- dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ...pe0... uposathakammaṃ ^a^V3.0174^ea^ ...pe0... pubbe...pe0... jhānā...pe0... sekkhā gotrabhuṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, vodānaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti; cakkhuṃ...pe0... vatthuṃ ^a^M3.0142^ea^ lokiye khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati. ^b^sahajātādhipati^eb^ -- lokiyādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 152^b^.^eb^ lokuttaro dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati. ^b^ārammaṇādhipati^eb^ -- nibbānaṃ maggassa, phalassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajātādhipati^eb^ -- lokuttarādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] lokuttaro dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati. ^b^ārammaṇādhipati^eb^ -- ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, phalaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti; nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa, vodānassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajātādhipati^eb^ -- lokuttarādhipati cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] lokuttaro dhammo lokiyassa ca lokuttarassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajātādhipati^eb^ ^a^T3.0164^ea^ -- lokuttarādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 153^b^.^eb^ lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimā purimā lokiyā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ lokiyānaṃ khandhānaṃ...pe0... anulomaṃ gotrabhussa... anulomaṃ vodānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] lokiyo dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- gotrabhu maggassa... vodānaṃ ^a^V3.0175^ea^ maggassa... anulomaṃ phalasamāpattiyā... nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] 154^b^.^eb^ lokuttaro dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimā purimā lokuttarā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ lokuttarānaṃ khandhānaṃ ^a^M3.0143^ea^ anantarapaccayena paccayo; maggo phalassa, phalaṃ phalassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] lokuttaro dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- phalaṃ vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] 155^b^.^eb^ lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo... sahajātapaccayena paccayo (pañca pañhā, ghaṭanā natthi) aññamaññapaccayena paccayo... dve... nissayapaccayena paccayo.

[03] 156^b^.^eb^ lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatūpanissayo -- lokiyaṃ saddhaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti...pe0... vipassanaṃ ^a^T3.0165^ea^ uppādeti, abhiññaṃ uppādeti, samāpattiṃ uppādeti, mānaṃ jappeti, diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti; lokiyaṃ sīlaṃ...pe0... senāsanaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti...pe0... saṅghaṃ bhindati; lokiyā saddhā...pe0... senāsanaṃ lokiyāya saddhāya...pe0... kāyikassa dukkhassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo; kusalākusalaṃ kammaṃ vipākassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] lokiyo dhammo lokuttarasa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatūpanissayo -- paṭhamassa maggassa parikammaṃ paṭhamassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena ^a^V3.0176^ea^ paccayo...pe0... catutthassa maggassa parikammaṃ catutthassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] 157^b^.^eb^ lokuttaro dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatūpanissayo -- paṭhamo maggo dutiyassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo...pe0... tatiyo maggo catutthassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] lokuttaro ^a^M3.0144^ea^ dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatūpanissayo -- ariyā maggaṃ upanissāya anuppannaṃ samāpattiṃ uppādenti, uppannaṃ samāpajjanti, saṅkhāre aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, ariyānaṃ maggo...pe0... ṭhānāṭhānakosallassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo; phalasamāpatti kāyikassa sukhassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] 158^b^.^eb^ lokiyo ^a^T3.0166^ea^ dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo -- ārammaṇapurejātaṃ, vatthupurejātaṃ. ^b^ārammaṇapurejātaṃ^eb^ -- cakkhuṃ...pe0... vatthuṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato...pe0... domanassaṃ uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti. rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa...pe0... phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa purejātapaccayena paccayo. ^b^vatthupurejātaṃ^eb^ -- cakkhāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa...pe0... kāyāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa...pe0... vatthu lokiyānaṃ khandhānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] lokiyo dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo. ^b^vatthupurejātaṃ^eb^ -- vatthu lokuttarānaṃ khandhānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo. (2)
[03] 159^b^.^eb^ lokiyo ^a^V3.0177^ea^ dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo -- pacchājātā lokiyā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] lokuttaro dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo -- pacchājātā lokuttarā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 160^b^.^eb^ lokiyo ^a^T3.0167^ea^ ^a^M3.0145^ea^ dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo -- purimā purimā lokiyā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ lokiyānaṃ khandhānaṃ āsevanapaccayena paccayo; anulomaṃ gotrabhussa... anulomaṃ vodānassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] lokiyo dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo -- gotrabhu maggassa... vodānaṃ maggassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] 161^b^.^eb^ lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā. ^b^sahajātā^eb^ -- lokiyā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo; paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0.... ^b^nānākkhaṇikā^eb^ -- lokiyā cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] lokuttaro dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā. ^b^sahajātā^eb^ -- lokuttarā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. ^b^nānākkhaṇikā^eb^ -- lokuttarā cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] lokuttaro ^a^V3.0178^ea^ dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- lokuttarā cetanā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. (2)
[03] lokuttaro dhammo lokiyassa ca lokuttarassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- lokuttarā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 162^b^.^eb^ lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo -- vipāko lokiyo eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ vipākapaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhā...pe0... paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0.... (1)
[03] lokuttaro ^a^M3.0146^ea^ dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo... tīṇi.

[03] 163^b^.^eb^ lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo -- lokiyā āhārā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca ^a^T3.0168^ea^ rūpānaṃ āhārapaccayena paccayo; paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0... kabaḷīkāro āhāro imassa kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] lokuttaro dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo... tīṇi.

[03] 164^b^.^eb^ lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo (paṭisandhi kātabbā); cakkhundriyaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa...pe0... kāyindriyaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa indriyapaccayena paccayo; rūpajīvitindriyaṃ kaṭattārūpānaṃ indriyapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] lokuttaro dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo... tīṇi.
[03] 165^b^.^eb^ lokiyo ^a^V3.0179^ea^ dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa jhānapaccayena paccayo... ekaṃ, lokuttaro dhammo...pe0... tīṇi... maggapaccayena paccayo, lokiye ekaṃ, lokuttare tīṇi.
[03] lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa sampayuttapaccayena paccayo... ekaṃ, lokuttaro dhammo...pe0... ekaṃ.

[03] 166^b^.^eb^ lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ. ^b^sahajātā^eb^ -- lokiyā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo; paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0... khandhā vatthussa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo; vatthu khandhānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejātaṃ^eb^ -- cakkhāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa...pe0... kāyāyatanaṃ ^a^M3.0147^ea^ kāyaviññāṇassa...pe0... vatthu lokiyānaṃ khandhānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchājātā^eb^ -- lokiyā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] lokiyo ^a^T3.0169^ea^ dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejātaṃ^eb^ -- vatthu lokuttarānaṃ khandhānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] lokuttaro dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ. ^b^sahajātā^eb^ -- lokuttarā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchājātā^eb^ -- lokuttarā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 167^b^.^eb^ lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ, āhāraṃ, indriyaṃ. ^b^sahajāto^eb^ -- lokiyo eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ...pe0... (yāva asaññasattā). ^b^purejātaṃ^eb^ -- cakkhuṃ...pe0... vatthuṃ ^a^V3.0180^ea^ ...pe0... (purejātasadisaṃ). vatthu lokiyānaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchājātā^eb^ -- lokiyā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo; ^b^kabaḷīkāro āhāro^eb^ imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo; ^b^rūpajīvitindriyaṃ^eb^ kaṭattārūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] lokiyo dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejātaṃ^eb^ -- vatthu lokuttarānaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)
[03] 168^b^.^eb^ lokuttaro dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- lokuttaro eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhā...pe0.... (1)

[03] lokuttaro dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ. ^b^sahajātā^eb^ ^a^T3.0170^ea^ -- lokuttarā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchājātā^eb^ -- lokuttarā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] lokuttaro ^a^M3.0148^ea^ dhammo lokiyassa ca lokuttarassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- lokuttaro eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhā...pe0.... (3)

[03] 169^b^.^eb^ lokiyo ca lokuttaro ca dhammā lokiyassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ, āhāraṃ, indriyaṃ. ^b^sahajātā^eb^ -- lokuttarā khandhā ca mahābhūtā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchājātā^eb^ -- lokuttarā khandhā ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchājātā^eb^ -- lokuttarā khandhā ca rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] lokiyo ca lokuttaro ca dhammā lokuttarassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- ^b^sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ^eb^. sahajāto -- lokuttaro eko khandho ca vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhā ca...pe0.... (2)
[03] natthipaccayena ^a^V3.0181^ea^ paccayo... vigatapaccayena paccayo... avigatapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] 170^b^.^eb^ hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā cattāri, anantare cattāri, samanantare cattāri, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte dve, pacchājāte ^a^T3.0171^ea^ dve, āsevane dve, kamme cattāri, vipāke cattāri, āhāre cattāri, indriye cattāri, jhāne cattāri, magge cattāri, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tīṇi, atthiyā satta, natthiyā cattāri, vigate cattāri, avigate satta.
[06] anulomaṃ.

[03] 171^b^.^eb^ lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... sahajātapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... purejātapaccayena ^a^M3.0149^ea^ paccayo... pacchājātapaccayena paccayo... kammapaccayena paccayo... āhārapaccayena paccayo... indriyapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] lokiyo dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo... purejātapaccayena paccayo. (2)
[03] 172^b^.^eb^ lokuttaro dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... sahajātapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] lokuttaro ^a^V3.0182^ea^ dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... sahajātapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. (2)
[03] lokuttaro dhammo lokiyassa ca lokuttarassa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] lokiyo ca lokuttaro ca dhammā lokiyassa dhammassa sahajātaṃ... pacchājātaṃ... āhāraṃ... indriyaṃ. (1)
[03] lokiyo ca lokuttaro ca dhammā lokuttarassa dhammassa ^a^T3.0172^ea^ sahajātaṃ... purejātaṃ. (2)

[03] 173^b^.^eb^ nahetuyā satta...pe0... nasamanantare satta, nasahajāte pañca, nāññamaññe pañca, nanissaye pañca, naupanissaye satta, napurejāte cha, napacchājāte satta...pe0... namagge satta, nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte cattāri, noatthiyā cattāri, nonatthiyā satta, novigate satta, noavigate cattāri.
[06] paccanīyaṃ.

[03] 174^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayā ^a^M3.0150^ea^ nāarammaṇe cattāri...pe0... nasamanantare cattāri, nāññamaññe dve ^a^V3.0183^ea^, naupanissaye cattāri...pe0... namagge cattāri, nasampayutte dve, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā cattāri, novigate cattāri.
[06] anulomapaccanīyaṃ.
[03] 175^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā cattāri (anulomamātikā kātabbā), avigate satta.
[06] paccanīyānulomaṃ.

[01] āsavo ca noāsavo ca dhammā noāsavassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ, āhāraṃ, indriyaṃ. ^b^sahajāto^eb^ -- noāsavo eko khandho ca āsavā ca tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. sahajātā -- āsavā mahābhūtā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo; āsavā ca vatthu ca noāsavānaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchājātā^eb^ -- āsavā ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchājātā^eb^ -- āsavā ca rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[01] āsavo ca noāsavo ca dhammā āsavassa ca noāsavassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ. ^b^sahajāto^eb^ -- noāsavo eko khandho ca kāmāsavo ca tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ diṭṭhāsavassa avijjāsavassa cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhā ca...pe0... (cakkaṃ). ^b^sahajāto^eb^ -- kāmāsavo ca vatthu ca diṭṭhāsavassa avijjāsavassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo (cakkaṃ). (3)

[06] anulomaṃ.

[03] āsavasampayutto ca āsavavippayutto ca dhammā āsavavippayuttassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ, āhāraṃ, indriyaṃ. ^b^sahajātā^eb^ -- āsavasampayuttā khandhā ca mahābhūtā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo; domanassasahagatā vicikicchāsahagatā uddhaccasahagatā khandhā ca moho ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo; domanassasahagatā vicikicchāsahagatā uddhaccasahagatā khandhā ca vatthu ca mohassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchājātā^eb^ -- āsavasampayuttā khandhā ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchājātā^eb^ -- āsavasampayuttā khandhā ca rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] āsavasampayutto ca āsavavippayutto ^a^T3.0228^ea^ ca dhammā āsavasampayuttassa ca āsavavippayuttassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- ^b^sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ. sahajāto^eb^ -- domanassasahagato vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato eko khandho ca moho ca tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhā ca...pe0.... sahajāto -- domanassasahagato vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato eko khandho ca vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ mohassa ca...pe0... dve khandhā ca...pe0.... [03] 7^b^.^eb^ ganthaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca gantho dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā -- arūpe idaṃsaccābhinivesaṃ kāyaganthaṃ paṭicca abhijjhākāyagantho, abhijjhākāyaganthaṃ paṭicca idaṃsaccābhiniveso kāyagantho (arūpe sīlabbataparāmāso natthi, evaṃ nava pañhā kātabbā), napacchājāte nava, nāasevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, nāahāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte nava, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.

[03] ganthasampayutto dhammo ganthavippayuttassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- ārammaṇādhipati ^a^T3.0323^ea^, sahajātādhipati. ^b^ārammaṇādhipati^eb^ -- ganthasampayutte khandhe garuṃ katvā diṭṭhigatavippayutto lobho uppajjati. ^b^sahajātādhipati^eb^ -- ganthasampayuttādhipati cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo; diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatādhipati lobhassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo; domanassasahagatādhipati paṭighassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. [03] 80^b^.^eb^ ganthasampayutto ca ganthavippayutto ca dhammā ganthasampayuttassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimā purimā diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatā khandhā ca lobho ca pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo; purimā ^a^V3.0346^ea^ purimā domanassasahagatā khandhā ca paṭighañca pacchimānaṃ ^a^T3.0327^ea^ pacchimānaṃ domanassasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo. (mūlā pucchitabbā) purimā purimā diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatā khandhā ca lobho ca pacchimassa pacchimassa diṭṭhigatavippayuttassa lobhassa anantarapaccayena paccayo; purimā purimā domanassasahagatā khandhā ca paṭighañca pacchimassa pacchimassa paṭighassa anantarapaccayena paccayo; diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatā khandhā ca lobho ca domanassasahagatā khandhā ca paṭighañca vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (mūlā pucchitabbā) purimā purimā diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatā khandhā ca lobho ca pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ lobhassa ca anantarapaccayena paccayo; purimā purimā domanassasahagatā khandhā ca paṭighañca pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ domanassasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ paṭighassa ca anantarapaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] 81^b^.^eb^ ganthasampayutto dhammo ganthasampayuttassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo... sahajātapaccayena paccayo... aññamaññapaccayena paccayo... nissayapaccayena paccayo.

[03] 82^b^.^eb^ ganthasampayutto dhammo ganthasampayuttassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo...pe0.... pakatūpanissayo -- ganthasampayuttā khandhā ganthasampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (mūlaṃ, tīṇipi upanissayā) ganthasampayuttā khandhā diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ lobhassa ca upanissayapaccayena paccayo; domanassasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ paṭighassa ca upanissayapaccayena paccayo. [03] 83^b^.^eb^ ganthavippayutto dhammo ganthavippayuttassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo...pe0.... pakatūpanissayo -- saddhaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti...pe0... samāpattiṃ uppādeti... mānaṃ jappeti... sīlaṃ...pe0... paññaṃ ^a^V3.0347^ea^... rāgaṃ... dosaṃ... mohaṃ... mānaṃ... patthanaṃ... kāyikaṃ sukhaṃ... kāyikaṃ dukkhaṃ... utuṃ... bhojanaṃ... senāsanaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti...pe0... samāpattiṃ uppādeti... pāṇaṃ hanati...pe0... saṅghaṃ bhindati; saddhā...pe0... paññā, rāgo...pe0... patthanā...pe0... senāsanaṃ saddhāya...pe0... paññāya... rāgassa... dosassa... mohassa... mānassa... patthanāya...pe0... phalasamāpattiyā upanissayapaccayena paccayo. [03] 84^b^.^eb^ ganthasampayutto ca ganthavippayutto ca dhammā ganthasampayuttassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo ^a^M3.0284^ea^...pe0.... pakatūpanissayo -- diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatā khandhā ca lobho ca domanassasahagatā khandhā ca paṭighañca ganthasampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ upanissayapaccayena paccayo. [03] 85^b^.^eb^ ganthavippayutto dhammo ganthavippayuttassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo -- ārammaṇapurejātaṃ, vatthupurejātaṃ. ^b^ārammaṇapurejātaṃ^eb^ -- cakkhuṃ...pe0... vatthuṃ aniccato vipassati, assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha ganthavippayutto rāgo uppajjati, vicikicchā...pe0... uddhaccaṃ...pe0... domanassaṃ uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti. rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa...pe0... phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa...pe0.... ^b^vatthupurejātaṃ^eb^ -- cakkhāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa...pe0... kāyāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa...pe0... vatthu ganthavippayuttānaṃ khandhānaṃ diṭṭhigatavippayuttassa lobhassa ca paṭighassa ca purejātapaccayena paccayo. [03] ganthavippayutto dhammo ganthasampayuttassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo -- ārammaṇapurejātaṃ, vatthupurejātaṃ. ^b^ārammaṇapurejātaṃ^eb^ -- cakkhuṃ...pe0... vatthuṃ assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha ganthasampayutto rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi...pe0... domanassaṃ uppajjati. ^b^vatthupurejātaṃ^eb^ -- vatthu ganthasampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo. [03] ganthavippayutto dhammo ganthasampayuttassa ca ganthavippayuttassa ca dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo -- ārammaṇapurejātaṃ, vatthupurejātaṃ. ^b^ārammaṇapurejātaṃ^eb^ -- cakkhuṃ...pe0... vatthuṃ ārabbha diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatā khandhā ca lobho ca domanassasahagatā khandhā ca paṭighañca uppajjanti ^a^T3.0331^ea^. ^b^vatthupurejātaṃ^eb^ -- vatthu diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ ^a^M3.0285^ea^ lobhassa ca domanassasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ paṭighassa ca purejātapaccayena paccayo. [03] 88^b^.^eb^ ganthasampayutto dhammo ganthasampayuttassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- ganthasampayuttā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] ganthasampayutto dhammo ganthavippayuttassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā. ^b^sahajātā^eb^ -- ganthasampayuttā cetanā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo; diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatā cetanā lobhassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo; domanassasahagatā ^a^T3.0332^ea^ cetanā paṭighassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. ^b^nānākkhaṇikā^eb^ -- ganthasampayuttā cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] ganthasampayutto dhammo ganthasampayuttassa ca ganthavippayuttassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- ganthasampayuttā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca ^a^M3.0286^ea^ rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo; diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ lobhassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo; domanassasahagatā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ paṭighassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. [03] ganthasampayutto ca ganthavippayutto ca dhammā ganthavippayuttassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ, āhāraṃ, indriyaṃ. ^b^sahajātā^eb^ -- ganthasampayuttā khandhā ca mahābhūtā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajātā^eb^ -- diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatā khandhā ca lobho ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajātā^eb^ -- domanassasahagatā khandhā ca paṭighañca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo; diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatā khandhā ca vatthu ca lobhassa atthipaccayena paccayo; domanassasahagatā khandhā ca vatthu ca paṭighassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchājātā^eb^ -- diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatā khandhā ca lobho ca domanassasahagatā khandhā ca paṭighañca ^a^T3.0336^ea^ purejātassa imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchājātā^eb^ -- ganthasampayuttā khandhā ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchājātā^eb^ -- ganthasampayuttā khandhā ca rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. [03] 96^b^.^eb^ hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe cha, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane nava, kamme cattāri, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre cattāri ^a^T3.0337^ea^, indriye cattāri, jhāne cattāri, magge cattāri, sampayutte cha, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā nava, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate nava.

[03] 31^b^.^eb^ nonīvaraṇo dhammo nonīvaraṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimā purimā nonīvaraṇā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ nonīvaraṇānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo...pe0... nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo. (mūlaṃ pucchitabbaṃ ^a^T3.0359^ea^) purimā purimā nonīvaraṇā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ nīvaraṇānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo; āvajjanā nīvaraṇānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo. (mūlaṃ ^a^V3.0379^ea^ pucchitabbaṃ) purimā purimā nonīvaraṇā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ nīvaraṇānaṃ sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo; āvajjanā nīvaraṇānaṃ sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 32^b^.^eb^ nīvaraṇo ca nonīvaraṇo ca dhammā nīvaraṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimā purimā nīvaraṇā ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ nīvaraṇānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo. (mūlaṃ pucchitabbaṃ) purimā purimā nīvaraṇā ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ nonīvaraṇānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo; nīvaraṇā ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (mūlaṃ pucchitabbaṃ) purimā purimā nīvaraṇā ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ nīvaraṇānañca sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] 33^b^.^eb^ nīvaraṇo ^a^M3.0309^ea^ dhammo nīvaraṇassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo... sahajātapaccayena paccayo... aññamaññapaccayena paccayo... nissayapaccayena paccayo.

[03] 34^b^.^eb^ nīvaraṇo dhammo nīvaraṇassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo...pe0.... pakatūpanissayo -- nīvaraṇāni nīvaraṇānaṃ upanissayapaccayena paccayo... tīṇi.

[03] 35^b^.^eb^ nonīvaraṇo dhammo nonīvaraṇassa ^a^T3.0360^ea^ dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo...pe0.... pakatūpanissayo -- saddhaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti...pe0... sīlaṃ...pe0... uposathakammaṃ...pe0... jhānaṃ uppādeti, vipassanaṃ...pe0... maggaṃ...pe0... abhiññaṃ...pe0... samāpattiṃ uppādeti, mānaṃ jappeti, diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti; sīlaṃ...pe0... paññaṃ...pe0... mānaṃ... diṭṭhiṃ... patthanaṃ... kāyikaṃ sukhaṃ... kāyikaṃ dukkhaṃ... utuṃ... bhojanaṃ... senāsanaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti...pe0... saṅghaṃ bhindati; saddhā ^a^V3.0380^ea^ ...pe0... senāsanaṃ saddhāya...pe0... paññāya, rāgassa...pe0... patthanāya, kāyikassa sukhassa, kāyikassa dukkhassa, maggassa, phalasamāpattiyā upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] nonīvaraṇo dhammo nīvaraṇassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo (tīṇi upanissayā). pakatūpanissayo -- saddhaṃ upanissāya mānaṃ jappeti, diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti; sīlaṃ...pe0... senāsanaṃ upanissāya pāṇaṃ hanati...pe0... saṅghaṃ bhindati; saddhā...pe0... senāsanaṃ rāgassa...pe0... patthanāya upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] nonīvaraṇo dhammo nīvaraṇassa ca nonīvaraṇassa ca dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo...pe0.... pakatūpanissayo -- saddhaṃ upanissāya mānaṃ jappeti, diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti; sīlaṃ...pe0... senāsanaṃ upanissāya pāṇaṃ hanati...pe0... saṅghaṃ bhindati; saddhā...pe0... senāsanaṃ nīvaraṇānaṃ sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ ^a^T3.0361^ea^ upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] nīvaraṇo ^a^M3.0310^ea^ ca nonīvaraṇo ca dhammā nīvaraṇassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo...pe0.... pakatūpanissayo -- nīvaraṇā ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā nīvaraṇānaṃ upanissayapaccayena paccayo... tīṇi.

[03] 36^b^.^eb^ nonīvaraṇo dhammo nonīvaraṇassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo -- ārammaṇapurejātaṃ, vatthupurejātaṃ. ^b^ārammaṇapurejātaṃ^eb^ -- cakkhuṃ...pe0... vatthuṃ aniccato...pe0... domanassaṃ uppajjati...pe0... tīṇi (purejātaṃ ārammaṇasadisaṃ kusalākusalassa vibhajitabbaṃ).
[03] 37^b^.^eb^ nīvaraṇo dhammo nonīvaraṇassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo... tīṇi... āsevanapaccayena paccayo... nava.

[03] 38^b^.^eb^ nonīvaraṇo ^a^V3.0381^ea^ dhammo nonīvaraṇassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā. ^b^sahajātā^eb^ -- nonīvaraṇā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo; paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0.... ^b^nānākkhaṇikā^eb^ -- nonīvaraṇā cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. (mūlaṃ pucchitabbaṃ) nonīvaraṇā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ nīvaraṇānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. (mūlaṃ pucchitabbaṃ) nonīvaraṇā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ nīvaraṇānañca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 39^b^.^eb^ nonīvaraṇo ^a^T3.0362^ea^ dhammo nonīvaraṇassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo... ekaṃ... āhārapaccayena paccayo... indriyapaccayena paccayo... jhānapaccayena paccayo... maggapaccayena paccayo... sampayuttapaccayena paccayo.
[03] 40^b^.^eb^ nīvaraṇo ^a^M3.0311^ea^ dhammo nonīvaraṇassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ (evaṃ avasesā cattāri pañhā kātabbā).
[03] 41^b^.^eb^ nīvaraṇo dhammo nīvaraṇassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ thinamiddhanīvaraṇassa uddhaccanīvaraṇassa avijjānīvaraṇassa atthipaccayena paccayo (cakkaṃ). (1)
[03] nīvaraṇo dhammo nonīvaraṇassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ (evaṃ nīvaraṇamūle tīṇi ). (3)
[03] 42^b^.^eb^ nonīvaraṇo ^a^V3.0382^ea^ dhammo nonīvaraṇassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ, āhāraṃ, indriyaṃ (saṃkhittaṃ). (1)
[03] nonīvaraṇo dhammo nīvaraṇassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ (saṃkhittaṃ). (2)
[03] nonīvaraṇo dhammo nīvaraṇassa ca nonīvaraṇassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ (saṃkhittaṃ) (3)

[03] 43^b^.^eb^ nīvaraṇo ca nonīvaraṇo ca dhammā nīvaraṇassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- ^b^sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ. sahajātaṃ^eb^ -- kāmacchandanīvaraṇañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā thinamiddhanīvaraṇassa uddhaccanīvaraṇassa avijjānīvaraṇassa atthipaccayena ^a^T3.0363^ea^ paccayo; kāmacchandanīvaraṇañca vatthu ca thinamiddhanīvaraṇassa uddhaccanīvaraṇassa avijjānīvaraṇassa atthipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] nīvaraṇo ca nonīvaraṇo ca dhammā nonīvaraṇassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ, āhāraṃ, indriyaṃ. ^b^sahajāto^eb^ -- nonīvaraṇo eko khandho ca nīvaraṇā ca tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhā...pe0... nīvaraṇā ca vatthu ca nonīvaraṇānaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo; nīvaraṇā ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo ^a^M3.0312^ea^; nīvaraṇā ca mahābhūtā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchājātā^eb^ -- nīvaraṇā ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchājātā^eb^ -- nīvaraṇā ca sampayuttakā khandhā ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchājātā^eb^ -- nīvaraṇā ca sampayuttakā khandhā ca rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] nīvaraṇo ca nonīvaraṇo ca dhammā nīvaraṇassa ca nonīvaraṇassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- ^b^sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ. sahajāto^eb^ -- nonīvaraṇo eko khandho ca kāmacchandanīvaraṇañca tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ thinamiddhanīvaraṇassa uddhaccanīvaraṇassa avijjānīvaraṇassa ^a^V3.0383^ea^ ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo; dve khandhā ca...pe0... kāmacchandanīvaraṇañca ^a^T3.0364^ea^ vatthu ca thinamiddhanīvaraṇassa uddhaccanīvaraṇassa avijjānīvaraṇassa ca sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo (cakkaṃ). (3)

[03] nīvaraṇo ^a^M3.0313^ea^ dhammo nonīvaraṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... sahajātapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] 46^b^.^eb^ nonīvaraṇo ^a^V3.0384^ea^ dhammo nonīvaraṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... sahajātapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... purejātapaccayena paccayo... pacchājātapaccayena paccayo... kammapaccayena ^a^T3.0365^ea^ paccayo... āhārapaccayena paccayo... indriyapaccayena paccayo. [03] 26^b^.^eb^ parāmāso ^a^V3.0426^ea^ dhammo parāmāsassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo... sahajātapaccayena paccayo... aññamaññapaccayena paccayo... nissayapaccayena paccayo... pañca.

[03] 27^b^.^eb^ parāmāso dhammo parāmāsassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena ^a^T3.0401^ea^ paccayo -- ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo...pe0.... pakatūpanissayo -- parāmāso parāmāsassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo... tīṇi.

[03] 28^b^.^eb^ noparāmāso dhammo noparāmāsassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo...pe0.... pakatūpanissayo -- saddhaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti...pe0... samāpattiṃ uppādeti... mānaṃ jappeti... sīlaṃ...pe0... paññaṃ... rāgaṃ... dosaṃ... mohaṃ... mānaṃ... patthanaṃ... kāyikaṃ sukhaṃ...pe0... senāsanaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti...pe0... samāpattiṃ uppādeti... pāṇaṃ hanati...pe0... saṅghaṃ bhindati; saddhā...pe0... senāsanaṃ, saddhāya...pe0... paññāya, rāgassa...pe0... patthanāya... kāyikassa sukhassa...pe0... maggassa, phalasamāpattiyā upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] noparāmāso dhammo parāmāsassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo...pe0.... pakatūpanissayo -- saddhaṃ upanissāya diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti, sīlaṃ...pe0... paññaṃ, rāgaṃ...pe0... patthanaṃ, kāyikaṃ sukhaṃ...pe0... senāsanaṃ upanissāya diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti; saddhā...pe0... senāsanaṃ parāmāsassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] noparāmāso ^a^M3.0346^ea^ dhammo parāmāsassa ca noparāmāsassa ca dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo...pe0.... pakatūpanissayo -- saddhaṃ upanissāya diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti, sīlaṃ...pe0... senāsanaṃ upanissāya diṭṭhiṃ ^a^T3.0402^ea^ ^a^V3.0427^ea^ gaṇhāti; saddhā...pe0... senāsanaṃ parāmāsassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 29^b^.^eb^ parāmāso ca noparāmāso ca dhammā parāmāsassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- tīṇi upanissayā parāmāso ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā parāmāsassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo... tīṇi.

[03] 30^b^.^eb^ noparāmāso dhammo noparāmāsassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo -- ārammaṇapurejātaṃ, vatthupurejātaṃ. ^b^ārammaṇapurejātaṃ^eb^ -- cakkhuṃ...pe0... vatthuṃ aniccato...pe0... vipassati assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha rāgo...pe0... vicikicchā...pe0... uddhaccaṃ...pe0... domanassaṃ uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti. rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa...pe0... phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa...pe0.... ^b^vatthupurejātaṃ^eb^ -- cakkhāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa...pe0... kāyāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa...pe0... vatthu noparāmāsānaṃ khandhānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] noparāmāso dhammo parāmāsassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo -- ārammaṇapurejātaṃ, vatthupurejātaṃ. ^b^ārammaṇapurejātaṃ^eb^ -- cakkhuṃ...pe0... vatthuṃ assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha diṭṭhi uppajjati. ^b^vatthupurejātaṃ^eb^ -- vatthu parāmāsassa purejātapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] noparāmāso dhammo parāmāsassa ca noparāmāsassa ca dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo -- ārammaṇapurejātaṃ, vatthupurejātaṃ. ^b^ārammaṇapurejātaṃ^eb^ -- cakkhuṃ...pe0... vatthuṃ assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha parāmāso ^a^T3.0403^ea^ ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti. ^b^vatthupurejātaṃ^eb^ -- vatthu parāmāsassa ca sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] 31^b^.^eb^ parāmāso ^a^M3.0347^ea^ dhammo noparāmāsassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo... tīṇi (pacchājātā kātabbā)... āsevanapaccayena paccayo... nava.

[03] 32^b^.^eb^ noparāmāso ^a^V3.0428^ea^ dhammo noparāmāsassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā. ^b^sahajātā^eb^ -- noparāmāsā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo; paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0.... ^b^nānākkhaṇikā^eb^ -- noparāmāsā cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. (mūlaṃ kātabbaṃ) noparāmāsā cetanā parāmāsassa kammapaccayena paccayo. (mūlaṃ kātabbaṃ) noparāmāsā cetanā parāmāsassa ca sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] 33^b^.^eb^ noparāmāso dhammo noparāmāsassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo... ekaṃ... āhārapaccayena paccayo... tīṇi, indriyapaccayena paccayo... tīṇi... jhānapaccayena paccayo... tīṇi.
[03] parāmāso dhammo noparāmāsassa dhammassa maggapaccayena paccayo -- parāmāsāni maggaṅgāni...pe0... (evaṃ pañca pañhā kātabbā) sampayuttapaccayena ^a^T3.0404^ea^ paccayo... pañca.
[03] 34^b^.^eb^ parāmāso dhammo noparāmāsassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ (saṃkhittaṃ). (1)
[03] noparāmāso dhammo noparāmāsassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ (saṃkhittaṃ). (1)
[03] noparāmāso dhammo parāmāsassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejātaṃ^eb^ -- vatthu parāmāsassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] noparāmāso ^a^M3.0348^ea^ ^a^V3.0429^ea^ dhammo parāmāsassa ca noparāmāsassa ca dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejātaṃ^eb^ -- vatthu parāmāsassa ca sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] parāmāso ca noparāmāso ca dhammā noparāmāsassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ (saṃkhittaṃ). (1)

[03] 35^b^.^eb^ parāmāso dhammo noparāmāsassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ. ^b^sahajāto^eb^ -- parāmāso sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchājāto^eb^ -- parāmāso purejātassa imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] 36^b^.^eb^ noparāmāso dhammo noparāmāsassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ, āhāraṃ, indriyaṃ (saṃkhittaṃ). (1)

[03] noparāmāso dhammo parāmāsassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ. ^b^sahajātā^eb^ ^a^T3.0405^ea^ -- noparāmāsā khandhā parāmāsassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejātaṃ^eb^ -- cakkhuṃ...pe0... vatthuṃ assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha diṭṭhi uppajjati, vatthu parāmāsassa atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] noparāmāso dhammo parāmāsassa ca noparāmāsassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ. ^b^sahajāto^eb^ -- noparāmāso eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ parāmāsassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0.... ^b^purejātaṃ^eb^ -- cakkhuṃ...pe0... vatthuṃ assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha parāmāso ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti, vatthu parāmāsassa ca sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 37^b^.^eb^ parāmāso ^a^V3.0430^ea^ ca noparāmāso ca dhammā noparāmāsassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ, āhāraṃ ^a^M3.0349^ea^, indriyaṃ. ^b^sahajāto^eb^ -- noparāmāso eko khandho ca parāmāso ca tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhā ca...pe0... parāmāso ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo; parāmāso ca mahābhūtā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo; ^b^parāmāso ca vatthu ca^eb^ noparāmāsānaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchājāto^eb^ -- parāmāso ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchājāto^eb^ -- parāmāso ca sampayuttakā ca ^a^T3.0406^ea^ khandhā kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchājāto^eb^ -- parāmāso ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 38^b^.^eb^ hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe pañca, nissaye pañca, upanissaye nava, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre tīṇi, indriye tīṇi, jhāne tīṇi, magge pañca, sampayutte pañca, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā pañca, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate pañca.
[06] anulomaṃ.
[03] 39^b^.^eb^ parāmāso ^a^V3.0431^ea^ dhammo parāmāsassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] parāmāso dhammo noparāmāsassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... sahajātapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. (2)
[03] parāmāso ^a^M3.0350^ea^ dhammo parāmāsassa ca noparāmāsassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 40^b^.^eb^ noparāmāso dhammo noparāmāsassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... sahajātapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... purejātapaccayena paccayo... pacchājātapaccayena paccayo... kammapaccayena paccayo... āhārapaccayena paccayo ^a^T3.0407^ea^... indriyapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] noparāmāso dhammo parāmāsassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... sahajātapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... purejātapaccayena paccayo. (2)
[03] noparāmāso dhammo parāmāsassa ca noparāmāsassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... sahajātapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... purejātapaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] 41^b^.^eb^ parāmāso ca noparāmāso ca dhammā parāmāsassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] parāmāso ca noparāmāso ca dhammā noparāmāsassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo ^a^V3.0432^ea^... sahajātapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. (2)
[03] parāmāso ca noparāmāso ca dhammā parāmāsassa ca noparāmāsassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] 42^b^.^eb^ nahetuyā nava, nāarammaṇe nava (sabbattha nava), noavigate nava.

[03] 43^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayā ^a^M3.0351^ea^ nāarammaṇe tīṇi, nādhipatiyā tīṇi, nānantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, nāññamaññe ekaṃ, naupanissaye tīṇi...pe0... namagge tīṇi, nasampayutte ekaṃ, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
[03] 44^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava (anulomamātikā ^a^T3.0408^ea^) ...pe0... avigate pañca.
[06] parāmāsadukaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 45^b^.^eb^ parāmaṭṭhaṃ ^a^V3.0433^ea^ dhammaṃ paṭicca parāmaṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā -- parāmaṭṭhaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0... (yāva ajjhattikā mahābhūtā).
[03] parāmaṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca...pe0... (parāmaṭṭhadukaṃ yathā cūḷantaraduke lokiyadukaṃ evaṃ kātabbaṃ ninnānākaraṇaṃ).
[06] parāmaṭṭhadukaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 46^b^.^eb^ parāmāsasampayuttaṃ ^a^V3.0434^ea^ dhammaṃ paṭicca parāmāsasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā -- parāmāsasampayuttaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0.... (1)
[03] parāmāsasampayuttaṃ ^a^M3.0352^ea^ dhammaṃ paṭicca parāmāsavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā -- parāmāsasampayutte khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. (2)

[03] parāmāsasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca parāmāsasampayutto ca parāmāsavippayutto ca dhammā ^a^T3.0409^ea^ uppajjanti hetupaccayā -- parāmāsasampayuttaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0.... (3)

[03] 47^b^.^eb^ parāmāsavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca parāmāsavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā -- parāmāsavippayuttaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ ^a^V3.0435^ea^ ...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0... khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā, ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ...pe0.... (1)

[03] parāmāsasampayuttañca parāmāsavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca parāmāsavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā -- parāmāsasampayutte khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ (saṃkhittaṃ). (1)

[03] 48^b^.^eb^ hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare dve, samanantare dve, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye pañca, upanissaye dve, purejāte dve, āsevane dve, kamme pañca, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre pañca...pe0... magge pañca, sampayutte dve, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā pañca, natthiyā dve, vigate dve, avigate pañca.
[06] anulomaṃ.

[03] 49^b^.^eb^ parāmāsavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca parāmāsavippayutto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā -- ahetukaṃ parāmāsavippayuttaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā ^a^M3.0353^ea^ cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ ^a^V3.0436^ea^ ...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0... (yāva asaññasattā) vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. (1)
[03] 50^b^.^eb^ parāmāsasampayuttaṃ ^a^T3.0410^ea^ dhammaṃ paṭicca parāmāsavippayutto dhammo uppajjati nāarammaṇapaccayā -- parāmāsasampayutte khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ (saṃkhittaṃ). (1)
[03] parāmāsavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca parāmāsavippayutto dhammo uppajjati nāarammaṇapaccayā -- parāmāsavippayutte khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ (yāva asaññasattā). (1)

[03] parāmāsasampayuttañca parāmāsavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca parāmāsavippayutto dhammo uppajjati nāarammaṇapaccayā -- parāmāsasampayutte khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ (saṃkhittaṃ). (1)

[03] 51^b^.^eb^ nahetuyā ekaṃ, nāarammaṇe tīṇi, nādhipatiyā pañca, nānantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, nāññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte cattāri, napacchājāte pañca, nāasevane pañca, nakamme dve, navipāke pañca, nāahāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
[03] 52^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayā nāarammaṇe tīṇi, nādhipatiyā pañca (evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ).
[03] 53^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayā ^a^V3.0437^ea^ ārammaṇe ekaṃ (saṃkhittaṃ), avigate ekaṃ.
[06] (sahajātavāropi paṭiccavārasadiso.)
[03] 54^b^.^eb^ parāmāsasampayuttaṃ ^a^T3.0411^ea^ ^a^M3.0354^ea^ dhammaṃ paccayā parāmāsasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā... tīṇi (paṭiccavārasadiso).

[03] parāmāsavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā parāmāsavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā -- parāmāsavippayuttaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0... (yāva ajjhattikā mahābhūtā) vatthuṃ paccayā parāmāsavippayuttā khandhā. (1)
[03] parāmāsavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā parāmāsasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā -- vatthuṃ paccayā parāmāsasampayuttakā khandhā. (2)

[03] parāmāsavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā parāmāsasampayutto ca parāmāsavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti ^a^V3.0438^ea^ hetupaccayā -- vatthuṃ paccayā parāmāsasampayuttakā khandhā, mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. (3)

[03] 55^b^.^eb^ parāmāsasampayuttañca parāmāsavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paccayā parāmāsasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā -- parāmāsasampayuttaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0.... (1)
[03] parāmāsasampayuttañca parāmāsavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paccayā parāmāsavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā -- parāmāsasampayutte khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. (2)

[03] parāmāsasampayuttañca parāmāsavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paccayā parāmāsasampayutto ca parāmāsavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā ^a^T3.0412^ea^ -- parāmāsasampayuttaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... parāmāsasampayutte khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ (saṃkhittaṃ). (3)

[03] 212^b^.^eb^ nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo nocittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo -- ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ paccavekkhanti, phalaṃ...pe0... nibbānaṃ paccavekkhanti. nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo; cakkhuṃ...pe0... vatthuṃ nocittasamuṭṭhāne khandhe aniccato...pe0... vipassati, assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha cittaṃ uppajjati. dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti. cetopariyañāṇena nocittasamuṭṭhānacittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānāti, ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ...pe0... ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ...pe0... rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa...pe0... phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ...pe0... nocittasamuṭṭhānā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... tīṇi (ārabbha kātabbā).

[03] 213^b^.^eb^ cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati. ^b^ārammaṇādhipati^eb^ -- cittasamuṭṭhāne khandhe garuṃ katvā cittasamuṭṭhānā khandhā uppajjanti. ^b^sahajātādhipati^eb^ -- cittasamuṭṭhānādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo (tīṇipi ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipatipi kātabbā). (2)

[03] nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa ca nocittasamuṭṭhānassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^ārammaṇādhipati^eb^ -- ariyā maggā...pe0... nibbānaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti...pe0... nocittasamuṭṭhāne khandhe garuṃ katvā...pe0... cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti. [03] 251^b^.^eb^ cittasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paccayā cittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā -- ahetukaṃ cittasahabhuṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ...pe0.... (saṃkhittaṃ. sabbaṃ kātabbaṃ. paccayavārassa pañcaviññāṇaṃ channampi mūlā kātabbā. sabbe mahābhūte tīṇiyeva moho. saṃkhittaṃ.)

[03] 252^b^.^eb^ nahetuyā nava, nāarammaṇe nava, nādhipatiyā nava, nānantare nava, nasamanantare nava, nāññamaññe nava, naupanissaye nava, napurejāte nava ^a^M3.0467^ea^, napacchājāte nava, nāasevane nava, nakamme cattāri, navipāke nava, nāahāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne nava, namagge nava, nasampayutte nava, navippayutte cha, nonatthiyā nava, novigate nava.
[03] 253^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayā ^a^V3.0576^ea^ nāarammaṇe nava (sabbattha nava), nakamme tīṇi ^a^T4.0119^ea^, navipāke nava, nasampayutte nava, navippayutte pañca, nonatthiyā nava, novigate nava.

[03] hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe pañca (sabbattha pañca), avigate pañca.

[06] (itare dve gaṇanāpi sampayuttavāropi sabbaṃ kātabbaṃ.)

[03] 257^b^.^eb^ cittasahabhū dhammo cittasahabhussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- cittasahabhū hetū ^a^V3.0578^ea^ sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasahabhūnaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo; paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0.... (1)

[03] 309^b^.^eb^ hetuyā ^a^T4.0146^ea^ tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, vipāke nava, āhāre nava, indriye nava, jhāne tīṇi, magge tīṇi, sampayutte pañca, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā nava, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate nava.

(paṭisandhikkhaṇe dvepi kātabbā, yāva ajjhattikā mahābhūtā) vatthuṃ paccayā ^a^T4.0157^ea^ bāhirā khandhā. bāhiraṃ dhammaṃ paccayā ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā -- bāhire khandhe paccayā cittaṃ, vatthuṃ paccayā cittaṃ (paṭisandhikkhaṇe dvepi kātabbā). bāhiraṃ dhammaṃ paccayā ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā -- bāhiraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā dve khandhā cittañca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe...pe0... vatthuṃ paccayā cittaṃ sampayuttakā ca khandhā (paṭisandhikkhaṇe dvepi kātabbā). (3)

[03] 333^b^.^eb^ ajjhattikañca ^a^V3.0616^ea^ bāhirañca dhammaṃ paccayā ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā -- paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittañca sampayuttake ca khandhe paccayā ajjhattikaṃ kaṭattārūpaṃ. ajjhattikañca bāhirañca dhammaṃ paccayā bāhiro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā -- bāhiraṃ ekaṃ khandhañca cittañca paccayā dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ, dve khandhe...pe0... cittañca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, cittañca vatthuñca paccayā bāhirā khandhā (paṭisandhikkhaṇe tīṇipi kātabbā). ajjhattikañca bāhirañca dhammaṃ paccayā ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā -- paṭisandhikkhaṇe bāhiraṃ ekaṃ khandhañca cittañca paccayā dve khandhā ajjhattikañca bāhirañca kaṭattārūpaṃ, dve khandhe...pe0.... (3)

[03] 334^b^.^eb^ ajjhattikaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā -- cakkhāyatanaṃ paccayā cakkhuviññāṇaṃ...pe0... kāyāyatanaṃ ^a^T4.0158^ea^ ...pe0.... ajjhattikaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā bāhiro dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā -- cakkhāyatanañca ^a^M3.0499^ea^ cakkhuviññāṇañca paccayā cakkhuviññāṇasahagatā khandhā...pe0... kāyāyatanañca...pe0... cittaṃ paccayā sampayuttakā khandhā; paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0.... ajjhattikaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā uppajjanti ārammaṇapaccayā -- cakkhāyatanaṃ paccayā cakkhuviññāṇaṃ sampayuttakā ca khandhā...pe0... kāyāyatanaṃ...pe0.... (3)

[03] bāhiraṃ dhammaṃ paccayā bāhiro dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā -- bāhiraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā dve khandhā, dve khandhe...pe0... paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0... vatthuṃ paccayā bāhirā khandhā. bāhiraṃ dhammaṃ paccayā ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā -- bāhire khandhe paccayā cittaṃ, vatthuṃ paccayā cittaṃ (paṭisandhikkhaṇe dvepi kātabbā). bāhiraṃ dhammaṃ paccayā ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā uppajjanti ārammaṇapaccayā -- vatthuṃ paccayā cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā (paṭisandhikkhaṇe ekaṃ kātabbaṃ). (3)

[03] 335^b^.^eb^ ajjhattikañca bāhirañca dhammaṃ paccayā ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā ^a^V3.0617^ea^ -- cakkhuviññāṇasahagate khandhe ca cakkhāyatanañca paccayā cakkhuviññāṇaṃ...pe0... kāyaviññāṇasahagate...pe0....

[03] ajjhattikañca bāhirañca dhammaṃ paccayā bāhiro dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā -- cakkhuviññāṇasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhañca cakkhāyatanañca cakkhuviññāṇañca paccayā dve khandhā, dve khandhe...pe0... kāyaviññāṇasahagataṃ...pe0... bāhiraṃ ^a^T4.0159^ea^ ekaṃ khandhañca cittañca paccayā dve khandhā, dve khandhe...pe0... cittañca vatthuñca paccayā bāhirā khandhā (paṭisandhikkhaṇe dvepi kātabbā). ajjhattikañca bāhirañca dhammaṃ paccayā ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā uppajjanti ārammaṇapaccayā -- cakkhuviññāṇasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhañca cakkhāyatanañca paccayā dve khandhā cakkhuviññāṇañca, dve khandhe...pe0... (saṃkhittaṃ). (3)

[03] 336^b^.^eb^ hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejāte nava, āsevane nava, kamme nava (sabbattha nava), avigate nava.

[03] 337^b^.^eb^ ajjhattikaṃ ^a^M3.0500^ea^ dhammaṃ paccayā ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā -- ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṃ paccayā ajjhattikaṃ kaṭattārūpaṃ, cakkhāyatanaṃ paccayā cakkhuviññāṇaṃ. (saṃkhittaṃ. evaṃ navapi pañhā kātabbā. pañcaviññāṇampi pavesetvā tīṇiyeva moho.)

[03] 338^b^.^eb^ nahetuyā ^a^V3.0618^ea^ nava, nāarammaṇe nava, nādhipatiyā nava, nānantare nava, nasamanantare nava, nāññamaññe nava, naupanissaye nava, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, nāasevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke pañca, nāahāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne nava, namagge nava, nasampayutte nava, navippayutte pañca, nonatthiyā ^a^T4.0160^ea^ nava, novigate nava.
[06] (evaṃ itare dve gaṇanāpi nissayavāropi kātabbo.)
[03] 339^b^.^eb^ ajjhattikaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho bāhiro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā -- cittaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā sampayuttakā khandhā; paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā sampayuttakā khandhā. (1)

[03] bāhiraṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho bāhiro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā -- bāhiraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā dve khandhā, dve khandhe...pe0... paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0.... bāhiraṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā -- bāhire khandhe saṃsaṭṭhaṃ cittaṃ; paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0.... bāhiraṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā -- bāhiraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā dve khandhā cittañca, dve khandhe...pe0... paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0.... (3)

[03] ajjhattikañca ^a^M3.0501^ea^ ^a^V3.0619^ea^ bāhirañca dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho bāhiro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā -- bāhiraṃ ekaṃ khandhañca cittañca saṃsaṭṭhā dve khandhā, dve khandhe...pe0... paṭisandhikkhaṇe...pe0... (saṃkhittaṃ). hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe pañca, adhipatiyā pañca (sabbattha pañca), avigate pañca (anulomaṃ).
[03] ajjhattikaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho bāhiro dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā (evaṃ pañca kātabbā, tīṇiyeva moho).

[03] nahetuyā ^a^T4.0169^ea^ pañca, nādhipatiyā pañca, napurejāte pañca, napacchājāte pañca, nāasevane pañca, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke pañca, najhāne pañca, namagge pañca, navippayutte pañca (paccanīyaṃ).
[06] (evaṃ itare dve gaṇanāpi sampayuttavāropi kātabbo.)

[03] 340^b^.^eb^ bāhiro dhammo bāhirassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- bāhirā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo -- paṭisandhikkhaṇe bāhirā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ bāhirānañca kaṭattārūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] bāhiro ^a^V3.0620^ea^ dhammo ajjhattikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- bāhirā hetū cittassa hetupaccayena paccayo; paṭisandhikkhaṇe bāhirā hetū cittassa ajjhattikānañca kaṭattārūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] bāhiro dhammo ajjhattikassa ca bāhirassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- bāhirā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittassa ca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo; paṭisandhikkhaṇe bāhirā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittassa ca ajjhattikānañca bāhirānañca kaṭattārūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 341^b^.^eb^ ajjhattiko ^a^M3.0502^ea^ dhammo ajjhattikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo -- cittaṃ ārabbha cittaṃ uppajjati. (mūlaṃ pucchitabbaṃ) cittaṃ ^a^T4.0162^ea^ ārabbha bāhirā khandhā uppajjanti. (mūlaṃ pucchitabbaṃ) cittaṃ ārabbha cittañca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti. (3)

(1)

[03] bāhiro dhammo ajjhattikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo -- dānaṃ...pe0... sīlaṃ...pe0... uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ paccavekkhati assādeti ^a^T4.0163^ea^ abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha cittaṃ uppajjati. pubbe suciṇṇāni...pe0... jhānaṃ...pe0... (saṃkhittaṃ, sabbaṃ kātabbaṃ) pubbe samudāciṇṇe...pe0... rūpe...pe0... vatthuṃ bāhire khandhe aniccato...pe0... vipassati, assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha cittaṃ uppajjati. dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati...pe0... rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa...pe0... phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ...pe0... bāhirā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (3)
[01] ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā ajjhattikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... tīṇi.
[03] 342^b^.^eb^ ajjhattiko ^a^T4.0164^ea^ dhammo ajjhattikassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^ārammaṇādhipati^eb^ -- cittaṃ garuṃ katvā cittaṃ uppajjati. (1)

[03] 343^b^.^eb^ ajjhattiko ^a^M3.0504^ea^ dhammo ajjhattikassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaṃ purimaṃ cittaṃ pacchimassa pacchimassa cittassa anantarapaccayena paccayo... tīṇi.

[03] 344^b^.^eb^ ajjhattiko ^a^V3.0623^ea^ dhammo ajjhattikassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo...pe0.... pakatūpanissayo -- cittaṃ cittassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo... tīṇi.

[01] ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā ajjhattikassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo... tīṇi.

[03] 345^b^.^eb^ ajjhattiko dhammo ajjhattikassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo -- ārammaṇapurejātaṃ, vatthupurejātaṃ. ^b^ārammaṇapurejātaṃ^eb^ -- cakkhuṃ ^a^M3.0505^ea^...pe0... kāyaṃ aniccato...pe0... vipassati, assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha cittaṃ uppajjati. ^b^vatthupurejātaṃ^eb^ -- cakkhāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa...pe0... kāyāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa purejātapaccayena paccayo ^a^T4.0166^ea^. [03] bāhiro dhammo ajjhattikassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo -- ārammaṇapurejātaṃ, vatthupurejātaṃ. ^b^ārammaṇapurejātaṃ^eb^ -- rūpe...pe0... phoṭṭhabbe... vatthuṃ aniccato...pe0... taṃ ārabbha cittaṃ uppajjati. dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti. ^b^vatthupurejātaṃ^eb^ -- vatthu cittassa purejātapaccayena paccayo. [03] bāhiro dhammo ajjhattikassa ca bāhirassa ^a^T4.0167^ea^ ca dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo -- ārammaṇapurejātaṃ, vatthupurejātaṃ. ^b^ārammaṇapurejātaṃ^eb^ -- rūpe...pe0... phoṭṭhabbe... vatthuṃ aniccato...pe0... taṃ ārabbha cittañca sampayuttakā khandhā ca uppajjanti. dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ ^a^M3.0506^ea^ suṇāti. ^b^vatthupurejātaṃ^eb^ -- vatthu cittassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo. [03] 347^b^.^eb^ ajjhattiko ca bāhiro ca dhammā ajjhattikassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^ārammaṇapurejātaṃ, vatthupurejātaṃ^eb^. cakkhāyatanañca vatthu ca cittassa...pe0... kāyāyatanañca vatthu ca cittassa purejātapaccayena paccayo; rūpāyatanañca cakkhāyatanañca cakkhuviññāṇassa...pe0... phoṭṭhabbāyatanañca kāyāyatanañca kāyaviññāṇassa purejātapaccayena paccayo.
